1.content:
Choose below a character from the Smash Brothers Universe.
Or do you wish to be from something not yet in the Smash Brothers universe?
Or perhaps something of your own creation..?
1.title: Are you good or bad?

11.content: Alright 'good guy', let's get your adventure started. Now, who are you, exactly? Choose from the options below.
11.title: Good Guys

113.content:
It was another beautiful day in the Mushroom Kingdom and everyone's favorite plumber/Hero/doctor/kart racer/miner/etc was on a stroll on his way to town for some lunch he was supposed to meet Luigi and the rest of his friends in celebration of Nintendo documenting their latest adventure.

"Ah what great day day!" Mario chimed to himself as he walked "I beat Bowser for the week, saved the Princess and the 8th Kart racing tournament is coming up!" As Mario walked towards the town he saw smoke coming from the town and rushed there to see the problem.

When Mario got there.....
113.title: It's Super Mario!

1151.content:
You're sprinting across the field. The ball is tucked under your arm. Sweat rolls down your face with each step and heave you make. The other team is right behind you. Then, the crowd cheers. The intercom blazes.
"NUMBER 13 HAS JUST SCORED THE WINNING TOUCH-DOWN! THE COUGARS WIN!"
The band starts playing 'We Are The Champions' and the fans pour from the stands and pick you up. They're cheering your name. You've never felt this way before in your life.
There's a girl sitting in the stands clapping very slowly. She smirks at you. She signals for you to come to her. She starts walking down the bleachers and heads behind the score boards. The crowd carrys you to your Chevy and drops you off. Your friend, Mike, walks up to you.
"DUDE! That was epic! We won the state finals because of you!" He slaps your back, " Hey, see ya later man,"
You think about that girl you saw. Should you go see her?
1151.title: Boy

11511.content:
You decide to go to the score board. The girl waves towards you.
"Hey, do I know you from some where?" You asked in confusion, not seeming to have a clue to who this person was.
"No, but I know you. I've been watching you. You are the Chosen One, destined to save the video game world. Please! I need your help!" She grabbed your arms, shaking them wildly.
"Alright, alright! Sheesh! Get a grip lady!" You hiss, pushing her off of yourself. You were tempted to leave then and there, thinking her mad, but decided to go along with her.
"Okay, grab my hand and let's get outta here before the R.O.B.s come and destroy you..." She whispered.
         She grabbed your hand and pulled out a necklace. It had a a jade emerald on a silver chain. She said something unintelligible, and suddenly the two of you were traveling through a giant tunnel. Then, it was absolutely quiet. You opened your eyes, looking around. The place was on fire and the girl rushed to another young female trapped under some wood.
"Olivia, is it-" she began.
         The newcomer coughed abruptly before replying.
"Y-yeah... They took Link and Ash and everyone else is just hiding..." She stammered, before averting her gaze to you. "Who's that?"
"Oh, he's the chosen one!" the girl whispered in joy.
"I think he has a name Sierra..." Olivia huffed.
11511.title: Walk to the score board

115111.content:
"My name is Aspen," you reply to the two squabbling girls.
         Olivia gave you a quizzical look, studying you intensely. What was she looking for, you wonder. Whatever it was, she didn't hardly have the time she thought she had, as there was a sudden pop and the wooden supports holding the building together collapsed, narrowly missing your group of three.
"Alrighty then!" Olivia heaved out, hand clutched close to her chest. She glared at you bitterly. "If you're the Chosen One, then go save everyone here! I'm taking Sierra and myself out of here!" she barked out, grabbing the princess and dragging her out of the building.
         You were completely and utterly mortified. Sure, you were probably one of the toughest guys at your school, but you weren't fire fighter material let alone "Chosen One" material, whatever that malarkey was about. Knowing you were losing precious time, you decided to stick a pin on that train of thought for the moment and get to the task at hand: saving the trapped occupants in the castle.
         You searched rapidly for any sign of life, scouring each room you came upon, but each one was devoid of any sentient being, and there were clear signs of a struggle going on in each one of these rooms. This led you to one possible conclusion: that the castle had been under attack, and all heroes and heroines had been the target for capture. This hardly made any sense to you at the moment. With all this deep thinking and sweating, you almost missed out on a distressed cry for help. Quickly, you followed the cry to its source.
"H-help..!" whimpered a familiar looking character, both of their arms being held firmly by some very sinister looking enemies.
"Oh shit..." you huff, knowing that this meant you were going to have to fight. You sure hoped that saving this familiar looking person was worth it...
Err...
Who was this easily recognizable character?
115111.title: Aspen

1151112.content:
Inexplicably, it was PoPo, the male ice climber.
"Let go of him!" you yelled to the duo of enemies.
         They spoke to one another in an odd tongue, one of which you didn't understand. It sounded like a clicking mixed with a sort of loud mumbled tone. Being familiar with video games, however, you could identify these foes as Primids; sinister creatures made from shadow bugs. Primids were under the control of Tabuu, who was the embodiment of Subspace.
         You have no idea why these things were here, as Tabuu was thought to have been destroyed in the final battle to return the pieces of the World of Trophies to their original areas. Glancing to PoPo, you quit thinking and get straight into action.
"PoPo, watch out..!" you huff out, rushing to grab his discarded hammer, which was set ablaze at the tip. Taking a moment to get accustomed to the weapon, you rush out and swing at one of the Primids, sending it flailing back into a wall where it then dissipated into a pool of shadow bugs. To its partner, you also swing, though it just manages to hang on and starts to flee with PoPo.
         Not willing to let Olivia or the Princess down, you chase after the creature as it flees down the flaming hall, PoPo being dragged hollering the whole way. You sprint, mustering what strength you can and swing the hammer, sending it flying towards the opposing creature.
1151112.title: Po Po

choices: We need to see if there are others!
11511121.content:
As you send the flaming mallet flying, you can't help but to grin. It streaks in a straight line directly into the back of the Primid, where it combusts into a cloud of flaming shadow bugs. Popo then proceeded to collapse to the ground, coughing and gasping for fresh air.
"Are you alright..?" you ask as you quickly approach the fallen ice climber.
         He says nothing before hesitantly nodding, still coughing as more smoke began to engulf the two of you.
11511121.title: Direct Hit

choices: Ask some questions! A lot needs explaining
Leave her be, she looks busy
115111211.content:
You tug your shirt over your mouth as the smoke around you began to thicken. You grab the small ice climber into your arm as though he were a football and begin to run through the flaming halls of the slowly crumbling castle. Your eyes watered as you scanned your way through the castle, attempting to find an exit of some sort. It was then you saw a flicker of daylight through a smoke-stained window.
That's our only way out... And it's too dangerous to stay here any longer, You think to yourself. You hope that no one else remains inside as you break through the glass, Popo trembling in your arm as a blaze of fire whipped from behind, attacking the oxygen it could grab. You land with a thud on the ground, remaining firm on your feet as you stood up to face the blue sky which was now being filled with the smoke from the castle.
"Please put me down," Popo whimpered, his gloved hands covering his eyes.
"Oh! Right, sorry," you exclaim, setting him down. "Are you alright?"
"Nana..." he stammered, some tears falling as he started to cry. "I couldn't keep her safe... They took her away..."
         You lay a hand on his shoulder, not able to find the proper words to comfort him.
"We'll find her, Popo. The others as well," a calm, angelic voice assured. It was easily recognizable as the Princess'.
"Sierra... I couldn't find anyone else, I'm so sorry," you begin to explain, but her finger silences your lips.
"If we are lucky, those that attacked us have taken the rest as prisoners. Though it is not ideal, it is better than the alternative," she said, almost in a calm, or rather apathetic, tone. "Even though you failed to get the others, at least you got one." Her direction turned to Olivia. "Olivia, make preparations to arrive at Dreamland. I have a feeling it has gone undetected from this moving threat."
"Right away, Ma'am," Olivia replied, giving a quick curtsy before quickly scampering away.
         You watch her go off out of earshot before turning your attention to the Princess.
115111211.title: Let's get out of here

1151112111.content:
Hesitantly, you finally work up the nerve to talk to the princess. You approach her, poking her lightly on the shoulder. She tensed and turned to face you, her long brown hair brushing against your face.

"Aspen," she huffs, looking slightly flustered. "You should be getting ready to leave. We will be departing this place soon," she explains, crossing her arms.

"Sierra, I need to ask you a few things," you start. You can tell that she taken aback, and almost seems troubled. "What's going on? What's happening?"

"Well... Uh..." she stammers. "Aspen, now really isn't the time for questions. Wait until we get out of here and then I'll-"

"You owe me an explanation!" you say sternly, somewhat irritated at her reluctance to reply.

         She glares at you disdainfully before sighing loudly, "Very well. What do you want to know?"

"Who's attacking us and why?"

"Well... As I have said before, I am Princess Sierra. I watch over each and every dimension and grant the needs and wants of the populace. You can imagine what kind of power that is, I assume?" she explains, raising an eyebrow at you.

         You stare at her, wide-eyed. How could she be so powerful? Where did it all come from? You're even more confused than you were to begin with, but you nod at her to continue.


"With all of that raw and uncontrolled energy, for obvious reasons, I'm a target for numerous sentients. No one will let anything get in their way; anyone with their right mind would be after me. To have anything that you desire?" she trailed off, her eyes darkening. "To have whatever you want... It's the ultimate prize."

"Okay... But what does that have to do with me?" you ask.
1151112111.title: Ask some questions! A lot needs explaining

11511121112.content:
She seems almost relieved as Olivia comes scuttling towards you both. You carefully note Sierra's mistrust in you, and her willingness to dodge all your questions. You could hardly call her first "answer" an explanation, and she was obviously using Olivia's arrival as an excuse.

"Alright, Sierra, everything is ready for us to leave," Olivia reported, giving her a small curtsy of respect.

"Thank you," Sierra replied, blinking appreciatively towards her. "PoPo, Aspen, it is time for us to go," she called out, peering over to the distraught PoPo, who immediately trotted over to join the small group. "Just remain calm and you'll be fine."

         What was that supposed to mean? Before he had time to question her again, she was quickly walking ahead in what appeared to be a large portal. Olivia glanced at you and smiled reassuringly as she followed Sierra in the opening. PoPo grabbed your hand rather tightly and stared up at you with his tear stained eyes. You take a deep breath and prepare for the worst as you follow them both into the unknown.
11511121112.title: Olivia Returns

115112.content:
Altough the name Chosen One sounded cool, I decided to use my real name instead.

"My name is Taylor" I replied. "Just call me Taylor."

"Why hello Taylor" said the girl known as Olivia.

"What was all this about LInk and Ash?"

"I told you before" said Sierra. "The video game world is in trouble. Link and ash are just two of the many characters here."

"Then why are we standing here?"

I ran into the burning building. Sierra and Olivia followed me with high hopes. I looked through the rubble, trying to find someone. I was finding nothing. But, I saw a structure that looked like a bed. It was flipped over and burning, but I saw something beneath it. I moved the bed away carefully, and I found...
115112.title: Taylor

1151121.content:
A little pink ball was under the burning bed. I grabbed it, rolled it over, and saw a face. This creature I found was Kirby, the mighty Star Warrior. He had a few ash marks on his face, and he coughed when he woke up. His eyes were glazed over at first, but he then focused his attention on me.

"Boyal?" he said. I forgot that he could not speak. He slowly got up, and looked around. He smiled and approached Sierra.

"Hello Kirby" she said. "Where are the others?"

"Boyal, Boyal!" he said. He ran deeper into the building, and the flames were getting bigger. He led us to a room with more burnt beds. Under each one, I found...
1151121.title: Kirby

choices: A odd looking vehicle of some sorts
11511211.content:
Mario and Luigi were under the two beds beside each other. Samus was under some rubble in the corner. Everyone was covered in ashes. Mario and Luigi were fine, but Samus was having a little trouble. Her leg had a cut on it, so I helped her up. She was a bit taller than me, but she smiled.

"Thank you" she said.

"Not to worry" I said.

Sierra and Olivia met up with us, and looked relieved. They looked like they wanted to tell me something important, but i headed towards the exit.

"Maybe we should get out of this fire first" I said. They nodded and we all left the burning building safely. I found a long piece of fabric, and tied it around Samus's leg to prevent anymore bleeding. She smiled and I smiled back.I walked to Sierra and Olivia, who had the same expression as last time.

"What is it?" I asked.

"I am judging you if you really are the Chosen One" said Olivia.

"Olivia, really!" said Sierra. "he knew all the characters here, and he might possibly know more!"

"I still don't think he will know all of them."

"Well, I play many video games" I replied. "Although I play sports, I always find time to play. I am not one of those complete violence games though."

Kirby walked up to me and tilted his body.

"Oh, sorry" I said. "My name is Taylor."

Kirby smiled and cheeredlaughed. His expression changed and he looked out into the distance. I turned, and saw a trail of dust. It was heading up the road and came towards us. Everyone got down behind some rubble to hide. I did as well, but I had no idea what it was. The object stopped, and the dust cleared.
11511211.title: Samus, Mario, and Luigi

115112111.content:
A armored car came up. Well, to be honest, it didn't really look like a car. It was metal and armored, but it looked like a cross from a hoodless jeep with a tank. A big blue penquin jumped down from the gun seat, walked over to the rubble, and laughed. I was surprised that the flames died out quickly.

"Man, that monster really did the job right" he said. "Isn't that right Escargoon?"

A gray snail with a darker gray shell made its way around to the front of the car. It had hair growths on the sides and at the bottom of its mouth.

"Well sire if you ask me it was a little too easy" said Escargoon. "Those two brats also thought they could handle us."

"Boy where they wrong!"

They laughed together, and we crowded around each other.

"Who are they?" asked Luigi.

"I know who they are" I said. "The penquin is King Dedede, the "ruler" of Dreamland. He is also a main boss for the Kirby series. The question is, why is Escargoon here?"

"Escargoon?" asked Mario.

"Escargoon is King Dedede's servent, his most reliable servent. But, he never appears in the games. I wonder why that is?"

"Sorry Taylor" said Sierra. "Even I do not have the answer."

We were interrupted by more laughter. "It's a shame though" said King Dedede. "I thought those so-called heros would put up more of a fight."

"Well it comes to show you" said Escargoon. "Even heros chicken out."

They laughed some more, and I looked at everyone. Kirby and Samus looked mad, Luigi looked scared, and Mario, Sierra, and Olivia were talking. Samus scooted over, and Kirby came near as well. She pulled out a small gray object out and smiled.

"This will show them" she said.

"What is it?" I asked.

"When they took my armor away, I managed to grab one missle from it. I can teach those two a lesson."

Kirby nodded, but I couldn't decide.
115112111.title: An armored car appeared

choices: Grab the missile and throw it at Kirby
1151121111.content:
I had to agree with Samus. King Dedede and Escargoon usually never won a battle. I faced her and nodded. At the same time, me, Kirby, and Samus jumped out. They stopped laughing and looked at us shockingly.

"Well well" said King Dedede. "Looks like our job became much more easier."

"We were sent here to check for survivors of the attack" said Escargoon. "But I would have never guessed their would be."

They both looked at Kirby angrily. "Kirby! I thought I got rid of you!" said King Dedede.

The others jumped out from the rubble, and they laughed some more.

"Who would of thought that we would find the rest of this rebelious group all here!" said Escargoon.

"Yeah,...uh...but" said King Dedede. "Who's that one guy?"

I believe they were talking about me. I looked down, and realized I was still wearing my football outfit. I wasn't suited for battle, but I prepared anyway. They laughed as Escargoon grabbed a walkie-talkie from the car.

"Yeah, send the reinforcements!" he said.

I heard some noises above me, and several robots came down. They reminded me of R.O.B., but they were very different. This battle was seeming one sided. All we ahd was a missile, and they had an army of robots. I looked at Kirby, Samus, and then the missile. An idea struck me before anyone did something.
1151121111.title: Fight King Dedede and Escargoon

11511211111.content:
"Kirby, are you hungry?" I asked temptedly.
He looked at me curiously.
"Poyo?" He asked.
"I've got a big snack here for ya!" I tempted some more.
"What are you doing with that? King Dedede asked nervously.
I threw the missle at Kirby and he swallowed it whole. A flash of bright light shot out and he held sveral smaller missles and wore a blue cap.
"Throw them Kirby! Throw them!" Everyone yelled.
"Poyo poyo!" He shouted happily. He threw them wildly at the robots. They burst into flames and discentigrated.
After all of them but a few and King Dedede were left, he gave me a missle.
"Poyo, taywor!" He smirked.
I smiled at him and stared at King Dedede and Escargoon.
"Hey, Happy Feet! Right Back at'cha with the 'heros don't fight back!" I shouted and then I threw the missle at him.
11511211111.title: Grab the missile and throw it at Kirby

choices: Find the rest of the group
115112111112.content:
The missile hit both King Dedede and Escargoon. They were launched into their vehicle, but King Dedede stood up.

"Don't think this is over!" he shouted.

"Here comes another one!" shouted Escargoon.

They screamed again as another missile came at them. They quickly drove off, not wanting to get involved. Kirby quickly changed back, and was laughing. We were laughing too. Samus approached me, and put a hand on my shoulder.

"How did you know about that?" she asked.

"I know everything about anything I like" I replied. "I know nearly every single transformation of Kirby."

Kirby walked up to me and jumped. I gave him a high-five, and he laughed with me. Olivia came up near me and bowed.

"Maybe I was wrong to judge you" she said.

"It's fine" I said. "You didn't mean too."

"So, what do we do now?" asked Mario.

I thought for a few seconds, and came up with an answer.
115112111112.title: it hits

1151121111121.content:
I turned and faced the rest of the group. "Everyone" I said, "We need to find the others."

"Why not just attack?" asked Samus. "With Kirby, we don't need anyone else!"

"There too powerful" said Luigi.

"Luigi is right, they are too powerful. Our friends may be spread across this land, but we need all of them to beat the bad guys. Who's with me?"

Everyone cheered and agreed.

"Now then, how do we get out of here?" I asked. "And where exactly is here?"

Sierra pulled out a...
1151121111121.title: Find the rest of the group

11511211111211.content:
Sierra pulled out a light blue orb and placed it on the ground. She pulled out her emerald necklace, and it flashed. The orb flashed in response, and a large land mass appeared. It was made entirey out of the light emitting from the orb. Sierra pointed to a far end of the continent.

"We are here" she said. "And our friends are locked up in several places."

She moved her hand across the continent, stopping at several locations. The points where she stopped had a red point on it. In total, there were four dots total.

"Each dot represents a jail for out comrades" continued Sierra. "Each prison is specially made for the jailers. Some cells are equipped with a device that drains the true powers of one. Others steal all weapons and items so you have no chance of escaping."

"My suit is being held here" said Samus. She pointed to the second closest prison on the map.

"Alright, so we know where we're going" I said. "But how are we going to get there?"

Luigi was in the pile of robot parts, shuffling through. Mario ran up to the edge of the pile.

"Mama mia!" he said. "Luigi! This is no time to be playing!"

"Wait Mario" said Samus, "He might be onto something." She climbed into the pile, and began to throw parts out of the pile. Olivia walked in as well, and the three began to build something. Me, Sierra, and Kirby walked off and took a break. Kirby was probably exhausted from the battle, and I was just trying to get everything settled in.

I can't believe I am actually here. I mean, I love video games, but I never thought I could ever really do this! This is the dream of every game nerd in the world!

"All finished!" said Olivia.

That was fast.
I looked at the contraption they built. It looked flat, but had seats for everyone and more. There was a gun mounted on the back of the vehicle, some jets beside it, and a steering wheel in the front.

"Not bad" I said.

"We can get to the first prison in no time!" said Samus.

"I hope we can find our frineds" said Luigi. I climbed into the strange vehicle, and Samus climbed in beside me. Everyone else got in the back. She grabbed the controls from me, not wanting me to touch them.

"I built the guidence system" she said. "So only I know how to drive it."

"Lead the way!" I said.

She started it up, and the machine began to float in midair. We started to move forward, but then we moved very fast. The prison looked like a simple dark shape out in the distance. We could get there soon.
11511211111211.title: A light blue orb

115112111112111.content:
We were making great time. The prison came closer and closer. I decided to ask Sierra more about the "Chosen One."

"So, what exactly can the Chosen One do?" I asked.

"Legend says that the Chosen One can use any ability from any game charater" replied Sierra.

"What do you..."

Suddenly, an orb of electricity crashed into us. The vehicle flipped, and we were launched. I looked up, and saw four creatures. One looked like a giant white squid. Another one looked like a jack-in-a-box, but it had a really creepy face on the end. The third one looked something like a blue snake. However, this one was shorter, had spikes out of its back, and had two propellors on its hands. The last one looked like a giant dinosaur head. I mean, just the head! Everyone got up and crowded together.

"W-What are these things?" asked Luigi nervously.

"I know what these things are" I said. "These things are monsters from Nightmare Enterprises. In the show, King Dedede always ordered them to destory Kirby. Kirby always won though, and King Dedede's monsters always backfired."

"Who are these guys?" asked Samus.

"The squid is Squishy, the Jack-in-the-box is Chuckie, the blue snake is Tornadon, and the giant head is Galbo."

"Can Kirby suck these things up?" asked Samus.

"He can't suck the monsters up, but he can suck in their attacks."

Kirby shuffled his feet again, and the monsters began to attack.
115112111112111.title: Attacked by Monsters!

1151121111121112.content:
Tornadon formed a large tornado and hurled it at us. Kirby sucked the giant funnel of wind completely. Even I was surprised. Kirby jumped in the air and spun wildly. A miniature tornado formed on his head, and a metal bad with a diamon-shaped gem formed at the barrier. He stayed in midair, flying.

"What is he now?!" asked Olivia.

"He is Tornado Kirby" I said.

"You don't say..." said Samus.

Kirby spun around, creating a even larger tornado around himself. all the monsters were sucked in and blown out of the top. They all landed beside us, and they got up. Luigi ran towards Chuckie, who was in his box. As Luigi ran closer, the box's handle began to turn. A creepy version of the song started to play, and then Chuckie popped out. He glared and flashed his teeth at Luigi. Luigi stopped, turned around, and ran for his life. Samus was defending herself from Squishy's tentacles, and Olivia and Sierra were mounting the cannon. Luigi ran up to Mario and headed for cover. Kirby eventually got crowded, and was being attacked from all sides.

I can't just stand here, I have to do something! I am the Chosen One! But...what can I do. Sierra said that I can use any ability as any of the characters but...

It hit me, right then and there. I ran up to the monsters and concentrated.
1151121111121112.title: Kirby sucks in Tornadon's tornado

11511211111211121.content:
I felt all the power rush to my mouth. I opened my mouth, and started to inhale. I couldn't even believe it. One of Squishy's electricity orbs flew in, and I swallowed it. It didn't taste like anything as it went down. I felt my body flowing with electricity. My head started to release sparks, and a metal band formed at the border. A round, blue gem appeared in the middle. I looked down, I was dressed in a yellow and blue robe, and my skin was yellow.

"This world just got interesting" I said.

I released the sparks all around me, trying not to get my friends hurt. Most of my sparks hit Chuckie, who burst into flames and ran around in circles. I got Squichy's attention, and Sierra got Galbo's attention. It was me versus Squishy, Kirby versus Tornadon, and Sierra versus Galbo. I had my own fight to worry about, and Squishy looked focused too. He kept shooting orbs of electricity, but I kept dodging them. I eventually got close enough, and let all the energy pour out. Squishy got burned to a crisp, and he fell over. I looked and onlt saw Chuckie's box, with no Chuckie. Sierra just destroyed Galbo, and Kirby took care of Tornadon. We all met together again, and everyone was surprised.

"How did you do that?" asked Olivia.

"Sierra told me that I can use any of the characters abilities" I replied. "I figured that I could do something like Kirby, but nothing like this!"

My entire body flashed, and I was normal again. Kirby changed back as well, and we all went back to the vehicle. We flipped it, and climbed back in. I made sure that I grabbed the controls before Samus, but she seemed that she let me. Right before I started to leave, I saw something on the hill beside us.
11511211111211121.title: Taylor uses Kirby's inhale ability

115112111112111211.content:
A masked figure draped in a navy blue cape was standing on the hill, staring at us with yellow penatrating eyes.
He jump from the hill and started walking towards us.
"Is that who I think it is?!" I asked barely in a whisper.
"In the flesh!" Sierra replied happily knowing I knew yet another character.
"Hello. I just witnessed your battle, and was intrigued by your... Abilities... But you wouldn't happen to be looking for the captains and Snake, would you?" He said in a deep mexican accent.
"The captains? Who are they?" I asked.
"Falcon, Olimar, and the Star Fox crew. Duh!" Olivia growled.
"Yes. We are looking for those guys, Meta Knight. Do you know where they are?" Sierra sighed.
"Of course I do. I was locked up with them, but nothing can contain me. I can take you there if you wish," he said.
I looked at the group. Luigi was under a chair crying cause he was so scared. Sierra seemed love struck, Olivia smacked her to snap her out of that trance. Kirby seemed a little uncertain. Samus nodded her head to me, indicating she didn't really care which way we went. Mario had fallen asleep.
Guess it was my decision.
115112111112111211.title: Meta Knight

1151121111121112111.content:
I agreed to let Meta Knigt join us. "Alright Meta Knight, lead the way" I said.

"Let us go" he said.

Meta Knight climbed in and we drove off closer to the prison. It came closer into view, and it looked different.

"Wait, is that...?" I asked.

"Yes" said Meta Knight, "That is King Dedede's castle. Dedede has turned his castle into a prison for others, and keeps several monsters around himself."

"Then we better get there even faster!" I put more gas into it, and we went even faster. King Dedede's castle looked even more menacing than I remembered it. Meta Knight suggested that we hide the vehicle behind a large rock. We stopped the vehicle, and gazed towards the priosn(castle). Waddle Dee's were roaming the sactle walls. The drawbridge was up, and the only other way in was too fly over the wall. I saw Meta Knight pull out some rope, and I knew what he wanted. He tied our arms together, and linked us all together. He walked us to the drawbridge, where we met two Waddle Dees.

"I have captured some more prisoners for the king" he said.

The Waddle Dees nodded and the drawbridge lowered. We entered the castle, and the drawbridge closed behind us. we entered one of the halls, and Meta Knight cut the rope joining us.

"Now, we need to find the dungeon" he said. "It should be in the basement."

"We should split up" I said.

"Good idea" replied Meta Knight.

I went with Kirby, Meta Knight went with Sierra, and Olivia went with Mario and Luigi. Unfortuantly, we ran into...
1151121111121112111.title: Go with Meta Knight

11511211111211121111.content:
"Watch where you're going you lazt Waddle Dee!" exclaimed King Dedede.

"Uh, sire!" said Escargoon.

King Dedede jumped and looked surprised.

"Kirby!" he shouted. "How di y'all get in my castle?"

"That's none of your business!" I replied.

"Well, looks like this one is a fighter" said Escargoon. "You want me to order a monster to come over here?
11511211111211121111.title: King Dedede

115112111112111211111.content:
King Dedede pulled out his large mallet and raised it high. "There is no need for a monster" he said. "I can clobber y'all myself!" He ran towards me, but Kirby jumped in front of me. He sucked up the mallet, and the jumped in midair. A white band formed around his head, and a smaller mallet appeared. Kirby came back down and knocked King Dedede away.

"Thanks" I told him. Kirby nodded and faced King Dedede.

He backed up, grabbed Escargoon, and pushed him in front.

"Escargoon do something!" he said worryingly.

"Don't you worry sire" he said. "I have the perfect monster for these two!" Escargoon pulled out a remote, and aimed it at us. "But for now, lets show them their friends!" He pressed the button, and a trap door opened up beneath us. We fell in, and landed on hard rocky ground. Kirby unfortuantly turned back, so we didn't have a way out of here.

"What do we do now?" I asked.

"There's nothing you can do" said a voice.

You look to the cell across from you and see...
115112111112111211111.title: King Dedede fights them himself

1151121111121112111111.content:
The cell across from us contained the other members of Cappy Town. Almost everyone was there. I couldn't believe that there was more anime than video game in this area. The other members looked at Kirby and looked even sadder.

"You guys are the villagers of Cappy Town, right?" I asked.

"Yes we are" said a voice. The person talking went towards the front of the group. He had a gray mustache, wore a brown hat, and a suit; the Mayor. "How did you know stranger?"

"I know almost everything about you guys."

"Oh yeah?" asked someone. It was an orange creature wearing chef attire; Chef Kawasaki. "Who am I?"

"You're Chef Kawasaki. You own the only resturaunt in town, but you're food is lousy."

Everyone in the cell laughed at that comment. "That guy already knows about Kawasaki's cooking and he didn't eve taste it yet!" said a voice. Chef Kawasaki rubbed his head embarassingly.

"Gee, I guess you do know about me" he replied.

"Wait, Kirby's here!" shouted a random voice. A young girl burst from the front. She had yellow hair tied into a ponytail, and a pink and green outfit. Another person ran forward and it was a smaller boy. He had orange and green hair, and wore blue pants. They looked for Kirby and smiled. Kirby smiled and waved to them as well. Then the girl focused her attention on me with gleaming eyes of anger.

"You better not hurt Kirby!" she said.

"Yeah, or we'll teach ya a lesson!" said the boy.

"Woah!" I said. "Tiff, Tuff, I wouldn't hurt Kirby!"

"Yeah right, and you...Hey! How do you know our names?" asked the girl, Tiff.

"I know almost everything about you guys! You two were the first friends Kirby had. Your parents are Sir Ebrum and Lady Like. Tuff's friends are Iroo, Spikehead, and Honey. Your closest friends are Fololo and Falala. You all live in King Dedede's castle. You..."

"Woah Tiff" said Tuff. "He knows almost everything about us!"

"I know a lot about Kirby too!" I said.

"Oh really?" asked Tiff. "What was Kirby's first transformation?"

"Fire Kirby, while battling Octacon." I answered.

"What monster was Kirby battling when he first turned into Cook Kirby?"

"Popon."

"Name the transformation that destroyed KIng Dedede's castle twice."

"What is this, the Kirby Quiz Challenge? That was Mike Kirby."

She looked at me in amazement, "Wow, I guess you do know a lot. But how?"

"well..."

The doors to the dungeon opened.
1151121111121112111111.title: Cappy Town villagers

11511211111211121111111.content:
King Dedede barged in through the doors with some Waddle Dees following him. They each carried a spear held up high. King Dedede laughed as he went towards our cages.

"You sorry looking Cappys will have to wait" he said. "I have biiger things to take care of." King Dedede opened our cage, the Waddle Dees entered our cage, and surrounded us. They led us out of the cage, and through the dungeon. I glanced at another cage, and I saw something. I was pushed through, so I couldn't get a good look at anything.

"Where are you taking me?" I asked.

"Just you wait" replied King Dedede. "There's someone I want you to meet first."

Anyone that King Dedede knows must be horrible.

We entered the throne room, and King Dedede pressed a button on his throne. A large machine began to appear from the ceiling and floor. A televison creen came out from the wall and turned on. A man wearing glasses and a suit came on screen.

"Yo Triple D!" he said. "What can I do you for? Ready for the rest of the monster?"

"Not yet" he replied. "But do you know anything about this thing?"

He grabbed me and showed me to the guy.

"Sorry Triple D, I have no idea who or what he is. Why are you so interested in this thing anyway?"

"when I fought him, he knew about Kirby well. A little too well. He also knewme and Escargoon."

"My my, that is a shock. Mind telling me who you are kid?"

"Like I'm going to tell you Customer Service!" I exclaimed.

"How did you know me?"

Oh boy, me and my big mouth.

"alright dude" said King Dedede. "You better spill it before I make you spill it?"

"What are you going to do tubby?" I asked.

"Hey kid!" shouted Escargoon. "The king may be fat and out of shape but there is no need to..."

King dedede smacked him over the head and Escargoon passed out. He then faced Customer Service. "Send me the rest of them monsters right away!" he said.

"Alright, standing my for download" replied Customer Service.

The machine glowed and a light orb formed at the center of the machine. Several monsters, different shapes, sizes, and looks, came out of the machine. I recognized all of them, but I didn't worry about that. I turned around towards Kirby.

"Kirby, suck them..." I stopped when I saw Kirby's mouth tapped shut. Several monsters crowded around me. They were Slice n' Splice, Dejaa, Blocky, and Hardy.

"What's it going to be kid?" asked King dedede.
11511211111211121111111.title: King Dedede

115112111112111211111111.content:
I didn't want them to see me use it, but I had no other way of escaping. Plus, I didn't want to tell them anything. I forced all the power I had near my mouth, and began to inhale. King Dedede and Escargoon screamed in terror as I did it.

"I thought that there Kirby could only do that!" said King Dedede.

I continued to inhale, hoping I would suck something up. The monsters held whatever items they had to prevent me from using them. I was starting to feel weak, but I kept trying.

"Someone stop him!" commanded Escargoon.

A giant windmill monster, Windwhipper, came up from behind and shot out razor stars. I didn't know if those were going to hurt, so I prepared for the worst. The stars went down like any normal thing I swallowed before. I felt the power grow inside of me, and a flash of light emitted. I was wearing a hat, one side red and the other side blue. I was holding a yellow rod with a glowing orb on the end. My clothes changed to something that matched the pattern of the hat. The monsters stepped back, and King Dedede looked mad.

"Anything but that!" he yelled.

I shot a beam at the monsters, trying to get them back. They began to attack me, so I formed a shield around myself.

"What are you guys even doing?" I asked them.

Slice n' Splice, one of the very few monsters who could talk, approached me.

"What are you talking about?" he asked.

"I mean, do you really want to fight me? I know almost everything about you guys. Some of you guys have great potential and could help out the Cappies. Every time King Dedede sends a monster to destory Kirby, the monster ends up getting destroyed. I mean, do you really always wanted to fight someone, or did you want to do something else?"

All the monsters in the room looked at each other. Some looked confused, and some looked like they agreed with me. King dedede looked on through the crowd of monsters, and stomped hopping mad.

"Stop this you freaks of nature and get Kirby and that other guy!" he exclaimed.
115112111112111211111111.title: Use your inhale ability

1151121111121112111111112.content:
"That is probably true... Many of us leave and rarely ever do return. And you say it is this creatures responsibility for that?" Slice n' Splice asked me.
"I don't want to mention names, but there's this guy named Dedede and he's right behind me," I sneered.
The creatures glared at him. He let go of me and stumbled backwards.
"What are y'all gonna do to me?" He quivered.
"Well, whatever you let happen to our fallen brothers and sisters!" Slice n' Splice growled.
King Dedede grabbed Escargoon and ran to the exit, but a WolfWrath blocked his path. He backed up and ran into a Bugsy. He stepped to the side and ran into another character.
"Hello, sir! Miss me much?" Asked a hot pink ball with angel wings and a mask.
"Galacta Knight?! You're not even from Nightmare!" Dedede yelled.
"I know, but I just felt like kicking your butt today," he replied happily.
"Give up, Dedede, and I'll call them off!" I demanded.
"Never!" He shouted.
The WolfWrath pinned him down and growled in his face.
"Dedede. Give up," I demanded.
"Alright! I give!" He pleaded.
"Nightmare Creations! Return Home!" I constructed. They obeyed and left, except Slice n' Splice.
"I have decided to join you," he said.
I gasped in surprise. "Really?"
"Yes. I will only obey you," he replied.
I freed the others and we surrounded Dedede. Sierra looked at him, and did something unexpected: she helped him up!
"Sierra?! He's an enemy! What are you doing?!" Olivia cried in horror.
"Even the worst of villains can be redeemed. Taylor just proved that. So, let's push Dedede in the right direction!" She cheered.
No one replied. Then, I helped her with him.
"Thank you..." He murmured.
"What? I didn't quite catch that," I teased.
"Oh, please don't make me say it again!" He begged.
Everyone gasped.
"Did he just say the magic word?!" Samus joked.
"Well, let's go freshen up at my castle, Taylor. Getting these guys and beating a boss does deserve a Pepsi!"
Sierra said joyfully.
"You have a castle?" I asked.
"Yeah! I'm the princess of the sky, don'tcha know?" She asked.
"We should find the others though!" Olivia commanded.
"Let's let master Taylor decide," Slice n' Splice interrupted.
1151121111121112111111112.title: The King CAN Learn

11511211111211121111111121.content:
Master, Slice n' Splice, my favorite monster from the Kirby series, called me master.

"Sure then, let's go" I said. "But not everyone can go. Sierra and I will take Kirby, Samus, Slice n' Splice, and Meta Knight. The rest of you free the others. Understand Dedede?"

"Yeah" he said unsurely. "But I have to tell y'all somethin. Not all the prisoners are here. When Meta Knight escaped, we sent some of the others to the other prisons. I can't even remember if any of them are still here."

"Taylor" whispered Slice n' Splice. "You know a lot about us. Is Dedede always this clueless?"

"Well, let me try to say one thing that describes him perfectly" I whispered back. "He can't read."

"That is pretty lousy."

"What are y'all talkin bout!?" he spoke up.

"Nothing" we lied.

The screen came back on, and it was Customer Service. He had a few burn marks on his face.

"Triple D what happened in there!?" he asked. "All the monsters won't listen to us anymore!"

"Hey, their your monsters, not mine" replied King Dedede.

Customer Service looked at me, and saw Slice n' Splice as well. "You!" he said angrily. "What did you do to my monsters?"

"All I did was give them a little pep talk" I said. "Slice n' Splice wanted to stay with me as well, so you're on your own pal."

"Wait! Let's not be hasty now. How about a deal?"

"You better not con me like you did Dedede several times before!" I replied.

"When have I ever conned Dedede?"

"Well, let's see. The Domestic Service Robot to rob Dedede clean, the ghost to for him to pay his bill, the trickery about how to get a cold so he would but two things from you to get that employee of the month record, the..."

"Alright, so maybe I conned him a few times, big deal."

He was pushed out of the way and another monster showed himself. It was a large broom; Broom King.

"Sorry about that guy Taylor" he said. "We monsters are the one who are wanting to set up this deal."

"What is it your majesty?" I said.

"Why didn't he do that to me?" asked King Dedede.

"Because your notreally considered royalty. Anyway, what is the deal?"

"Dedede, you still have your phone?" he asked.

KIng Dedede pulled out a small, yellow cell phone.

"Taylor, there is another function to that phone. The phone also acts as a portable Monster Delivery System. Just call us first, and all the monsters you will need will be sent."

"Thanks Broom KIng."

"Why didn't that Sales dude tell me any of that!?" exclaimed Dedede.

I grabbed the cell phone from him. "Again, your not really trustworthy" I said. I turned to sierra, who had her necklace out. "We're ready" I said.

She nodded and the emerald on her necklace glew. Before we went away, I turned one more time.

"I'll call you guys when we're ready" I said before vanishing. Everything around me became white. The light cleared, and we stood at a grand entrance to a large and beautiful castle. It was entirely made of white marble. There were golden flags on top some of the pillars, and some yellow decals along the sides. Sierra began to walk into the door, and we followed her. The grand entrance was EXTREMELY grand. It was a large room in the same style as everything else. It almost seemed dark outside, like we have been doing this for a while. Kirby looked tired too, and Samus looked exhausted.

"Taylor" said Sierra, "Should we rest or do you want a tour of the castle?"
11511211111211121111111121.title: Sky Castle

choices: Wake up in middle of night
115112111112111211111111211.content:
"Sorry Sierra" I said, "But everyone is tired. We all need some rest."

"That is no worries" she said. "Follow me to your rooms."

She led us up a flight of stairs, and into a grand hallway. Several doors were in the hall, each one facing each other. The doors were just big enough to fit Slice n' Splice. He and I shared a room. I wasn't sure about the rest; Sierra was probably going to give Meta Knight the best room. The room we were in was better than a luxury suite at a regular hotel. Slice n' Splice placed his weapons down and looked around.

"I was never treated with this much kindness at Nightmare Enterprises" he said.

"Well, that's the difference between us and them" I said.

He smiled and went out to the balcony. I headed for the bathroom to get a shower. When you played football, and battled a few times, you smell pretty bad. There were fresh clothes in there for me too. They were almost perfect for me, almost like Sierra expected me here. The clothes I got were not exactly knoght attire, but they seemed pretty fancy. I got a light blue shirt with a yellow elbem on it. The pants seemed like they were made of silk. They were a darker shade of blue with black decals. The clothes looked strong, almost like armor. I went to bed, almost wanting to know what was going to happen tomorrow.
115112111112111211111111211.title: Rest, everyone deserves it

choices: Stay and talk/ train with her
1151121111121112111111112112.content:
I woke up in the middle of the night. I got out of my awesome bed and walked down the hall to the court yard. I saw Sierra there, sitting on a rock and prodding at the water.
"Hello, Taylor. You were restless, too, I see..." She said in a hushed whisper.
I was surprised she knew I was in the room without looking up or anything.
"Yes... I was wondering if you could explain to me what's going on..." I asked her pleasantly.
She looked up at me with grey eyes. They were almost like an animals eyes, the way they sparkled in the stars.
"Yes, there is a need of an explanation here..." She sighed. "Well, it was a normal day and then something bombed my other castle. The one you saw before it..." She gulped with a shaky voice. "I had to take evasive action. So, I teleported, trusting the stars would guide me to the right person and then I landed at your foot ball game. I sat and watched you and other players, trying to see who I saught out. Then, you did it. The other team was about to score and you pulled out the most amazing play I had ever seen and scored. I knew then you were the one. You came and accepted the offer and we were gone. You rescued everyone left in the castle. You redeemed the Nightmare Monsters and found out where to get Dedede and the others. But-" she said, spoiling my moment of epicness.
"I'm still curious why you use only Kirby's abilities. You can use Meta Knight's abilities and even mine. Why don't you try them. If only the enemy knows you can use the Kirby ability very well, we can use that as upper hand and attack him with the combination of every powerful attack that everyone can use! But, it takes practice just to master a single ability. But I feel I have wasted enough of your night. You should go to bed..." She sighed as she stared at the stars.
1151121111121112111111112112.title: A Special Story

11511211111211121111111121121.content:
I stayed and listened to what she said. I couldn't believe it. I was about to go back to bed, but I stayed.

"The reason why I kept using Kirby's abilities is because I don't know about any more of them" I said. "I know that Meta Knight has powers, and there are other characters in this world. But, I don't know who else is in here. And I never knew other humans lived in the video game world either. I once played a game involving a cross over world, but Escargoon is in this world. Escargoon was never introduced in the games, only the television show. If you can, I would like to learn a little more."

She opened one of her eyes and smiled, "That is what I would like to hear. Please, sit down and meditate with me."

I walked over to where she was sitting. I sat down, crossed my legs, and closed my eyes. Everything was dark at first, but then everything turned a majestic pink. I saw Sierra sitting there beside me. She was focusing in front of her, so I did the same. I saw several figures pass by, all video game characters. I recognized most of them. There was Ash from Pokemon, Link from Legend of Zelda, even Mr. Game and Watch.

"What is this place?" I asked.

"This is where you can train your abilities" said Sierra. "You saw some of the characters from video games, and some of those are the characters you can use. Which one do you want to begin with?"
11511211111211121111111121121.title: Learning

115112111112111211111111211211.content:
"Pokemon" I said. "Pokemon has always been my favorite strategy game ever since I was a kid. My parents said I was too old for Pokemon, but I ignored them and kept playing."

"That is not bad" replied Sierra. "You let your true intentions out and keep them hidden when possible. May I ask, how many games have you played?"

"Well, I'm not 100% sure if you know this, but a new series came out recently. So, I have five games, each set with at least six Pokemon each."

"Let us begin."

She stood up, and turned towards me. I stood up as well, and the area around us changed. It appeared to be a traditional Pokemon battlefield. I was amazed by what was happening. Sierra giggled when she saw my reaction.

"To master this power" she started, "You must imagine your Pokemon. Every trainer has their own personalities, and each Pokemon has one differently as well. You must imagine that precise Pokemon."

I closed my eyes and focused. I saw every single Pokemon I have ever caught in the games. I always imagined them as real creatures when I was little, and I sometimes made them different. I couldn't decide on one, so I let my subconscious choose. I felt something in my hadn, and I opened my eyes. To my surprise, I saw a Pokeball. A actual, real, psyhical, POKEBALL! I threw it immediately, and it opened. To my surprise, it was Speckle, my Hydregeion. Hydregeion is a black and purple dragon Pokemon. It had three heads, but only one of them had control of its body. It had a fuschia colored crest on its head, and six wings. The only difference between a regular Hydregeion and my Hydregeion is that Speckle has white specks on her fur; hence her name. She landed on the ground and looked around. She slowly turned around, and saw me. She loocked shocked, and she turned completely towards me. I slowly walked near her.

"S...Speckle?" I said.

Speckle ran at me and tackled me to the ground. She bit my leg hard, but she let go quickly. I laughed as she grabbed me and nuzzled her snout into my chest. Sierra ran up to us, and Speckle faced her and growled. She backed up, but I told Speckle to stop.

"Sorry" I said. "I always imagined my Pokemon to have REAL personalities. Speckle is very tough, protective, and powerful. She always bites my leg lovingly when she first comes out."

"That's some love" she replied.
115112111112111211111111211211.title: Pokemon

1151121111121112111111112112111.content:
I kept hearin my name, and everything around me dissappeared. I opened my eyes, and I saw Slice n' Splice.

"Master Taylor!" he exclaimed.

Sierra got up and yelled at him, "Why did you interrput!"

"Sorry to interrput your training sire" he continued. "But, your phone rang."

He handed me the phone, and I opened it. Instead of listening, a video appeared. King Dedede was on screen.

"What do you want?" I asked.

"Well...uh...sorry to interupt...but..." he stammered.

Escargoon pushed him out of the way and appeared.

"Oh give it here!" he said. "Sorry Taylor, the King can be stupid at times."

"I know, continue."

"Anyway, we unfortuantly have some bad news. The King accidentally sent all of the prisoners to the other prisons. Sorry, but to find the others, you're going to have to rescue them at the other places."

"It's not your fault Escargoon, but thanks fro the info."

He signed off, and in put the phone away. Sierra still looked annoyed by Slice n' Splice, but she still looked worried. "What are we going to do?" she asked.

"The only thing we can do" I said. "We rescue the others."

"Brilliant idea sire!" said Slice n' Splice.

The next morning, we all got something to eat, and we prepared to go back. Sierra pulled out her necklace again and we were back where we first set off. we met up with the rest of them, and we set out. While we were in Sierra's castle, the others built several different vehicles to not only let us travel faster, but also to make room for others that might join us. Kirby got his Starship as a car, Me and Slice n' Splice got a large vehicle, adn Meta Knight got his own car. Me, Slice n' Splice, Kirby, and Sierra met with the Cappies before we left.

"Are you sure you have to leave Kirby?" asked Tiff. "We could use your help in rebuilding Cappy Town."

"Poyo!" said Kirby. He pointed to us, and smiled.

"Look like Kirby wants to go with them" said Tuff.

"Well, that's a relief" said a voice.

A small yellow bird flew down and landed in front of us; Tokkori "Kirby wouldn't be much help anyway" he said. "Kirby is no help!"

"That's not nice Tokkori!" said Tiff. "Kirby and Taylor saved us, even you!"

Yeah, well, good luck with that."

"I wouldn't say that Tokkori" I said.

"What does that mean?"

"Your coming with us!"

"Why on blue balzes would I do that?!"

Slice n' Splice walked forward, and Tokkori looked scared. He slowly walked up to Kirby, and flew on top of his head.

"A-Alright..Junior, let's go" he said nervously.

Kirby cheered and we entered our cars. Samus seemed really excited, since her armor was in the second prison. Meta Knight also informed that there was a rebel outpost just at the border of the second prison area.
1151121111121112111111112112111.title: Training is interrputed

11511211111211121111111121121111.content:
About an hour out from the castle, the phone rang. I opened it, and Broom King appeared.

"Taylor, I have some bad news" he said.

"What is it?" I asked. I turned on the intercom link to all of our cars so everyone could listen.

"About a hand full of monsters decided to do whatever they wanted to do, the ones that were not sent to the castle at the time. They sent themselves through the Monster Delivery System. But not to worry, they did not go through the phone's transport system."

"Then where did they escape?"

"Through Dedede's system" said Meta Knight.

"Correct" replied Broom King. "There heading your way now."

"Hold on Broom King, let me put you on hold." I closed the phone and began to talk with the others. "What should we do? Those monsters can cause trouble.”

“We need to get to the next prison” said Olivia.

“Maybe we should stay and fight sire” said Slice n’ Splice.

“Poyo!” exclaimed Kirby.

“I think Junior is going to stay and fight too” said Tokkori.

“Let me and Luigi fight too!” said Mario.

“Everyone else, head for the checkpoint” I said. “We will meet you there as soon as we can.”

Me, Kirby, and Mario stopped our cars and jumped out.

“Ready Slice n’ Splice?” I asked him.

“I am always ready to fight at your side!” he replied.

I opened my phone, and Broom King was still there. “What are we dealing with Broom King?” I asked.

A smaller screen popped up beside him and began shuffling through the monster database. Five monsters appeared. Popon, Crab, Cobgoblin, Belly Buster, and Ebifryer. Strangely, they were all the food monsters.

"So, do you want me to send anymore monsters?" asked Broom King
11511211111211121111111121121111.title: The phone rang

115112111112111211111111211211111.content:
"Yes" I replied. "I want you to send three monsters."

"Which ones are they?" he asked.

"I would like Monisuer Goan, Dejaa, and...thrown in Bugzzy."

"Please wait."

My phone started to hum and glow. The antenna raised, and a beam shot out from it. Monisuer Goan was sent first. He looks like a potato dressed in a chef attire. He wore sunglasses, a chef hat, a blue hat, and had a mustache and eyebrows. He nodded and walked beside me. A second beam shoy out, and Dejaa came. Dejaa is a smaller monster, but is very powerfull. He is a living bomb supply. A third beam shot out, and Bugzzy appeared. Bugzzy is a giant beetle that carries two weapons; a club, and a sword. He raised both weapons proudly and grunted.

"Everyone ready?" I asked.

Slice n' Splice raised his weapons high, Monsiuer Goan transformed into his true form, Dejaa prepared two bombs, and Bugzzy smashed the ground in front of him with his club. Mario and Luigi looked ready, and so did Kirby. I saw the monsters coming, so I gave the first order.

"Monsiuer Goan" I said, "Give Kirby one of your utensils."

Monsiuer Goan threw his ladel at Kirby, and he sucked it up. Kirby jumped and flipped in midair. A chef's hat appeared on his head, and a frying pan formed into his hand. He became Chef Kirby. Everyone was ready, and the monsters were inbound. The first one that came was Belly Buster, but he came in the form I didn't want. Belly Buster has two forms like Monsiuer Goan. Belly Buster in his current form looked like a giant pie with five hands, each carrying a frying pan. Belly Buster spun around and pies flew everywhere.
115112111112111211111111211211111.title: Yes

1151121111121112111111112112111111.content:
Belly Buster's pies rained down everywhere. Kirby had a horried look on his face, and I was probably the only one who knew. I tried to keep my mouth closed, but some pie went in. I was expecting something else, but the pies tasted pretty good.

"Kirby" I said, "Try the pies."

He shook his head no. But after a while, he did eventually. His expression changed completely afetr he tried one. He ate pie after pie after one taste.

"Why was he so worried?" asked Slice n' Splice.

"In the show, Belly Buster made pies that even Kirby wouldn't eat" I replied. "But now, they taste pretty good."

Belly Buster must have heard this, because he flew lower. He looked at me slightly worried. "I am being serious" I told him. "You're pies are not that bad."

He looked happier, but we were interupted by the other monsters. Popon, Cobgoblin, and Crab looked fierce, but Ebifryer looked worried. It was almost like he did not want to be here. Everyone got ready again, and Belly Buster joined us. Maybe just a good complement was all it took. Popon said something, but I couldn't understand him.

"Popon says that they want to attack King Dedede" translated Slice n' Splice.

"Wasn't he at the castle?" I asked.

Popon shook its head. I knew that answer. King Dedede must have hid from them when they arrived. Cobgoblin grabbed me with his tendrils and brought me closer. Some of his tendrils forced my mouth to open, and he spun around, shooting corn kernels into my mouth. I felt the kernels explode in me, kinda forcing me into different directions. After the last kernel, I fell to the ground. Slice n' Splice ran up to me and forced Cobgoblin back.

"Are you alright Master?" he asked.

"I always hated corn" I replied.

I got up and faced Cobgoblin. He gestered his hands as "Bring it on!"

"I hate to turn you into popcorn Cobgoblin" I said. "But you attacked me, and that is considered to be an enemy!"

Slice n' Splice was knocked back, and a claw grabbed me. Ebifryer grabbed me and held me near his mouth. Ebifryer looks like a mix up of a lobster and several other food ingredients. He had one eye, and his mouth was found lower on his chest. It slowly opened, and I saw some flames form.
1151121111121112111111112112111111.title: A Change of Heart

choices: Found a crashed Star Fox Ship
11511211111211121111111121121111111.content:
Ebifryer turned the last second, and spat flames at Cobgoblin. He screamed in horror, and popcorn flew everywhere. I looked at him, and he looked back at me with his one eye.

"You are still on our side?" I asked.

He slowly nodded, and I smiled at him. He managed to smile, but the smile was wiped clean when we got attacked. I turned and saw Popon, laughing at us. Cook Kirby, Dejaa, and Mario were near him.

"Dejaa! Mario! Turn up the heat with Popon!" I commanded.

Mario threw fireballs and Dejaa threw bombs. Popon tumbled back, where Kirby was waiting with his pan enlarged. He threw it up in the air, and it disappeared. Bugzzy and Slice n' Splice ended up smashing Crab's shell. Cobgoblin's burnt core was laying on the ground. Ebifryer slowly put me down, and I immediately opened my phone. Broom King was the one who answered.

"Broom King, is there anyway to revitalize the defeated monsters?" I asked.

"There is a way" he said. "But there has to be some remain of the monster to do it. Why?"

"Belly Buster and Ebifryer came over willingly. The rest we had to fight."

"Just send them over, and we will see what we can do."

I aimed the beam at Cobgoblin's core first. I then sent the smashed Crab. Kirby's frying pan came back down with fried Popon. He was sent back next. I also sent back Belly Buster, Bugzzy, and Ebifryer. Dejaa and Monsieur Goan could stay with me for a while. Everyone hopped back into there vehicles, and we drove off.
11511211111211121111111121121111111.title: Ebifryer the hero

115112111112111211111111211211111111.content:
The outpost didn't look that far away. We could see it in the distance. It was very small and looked like it was made of wood.

"Sire" said Slice n' Splice. "I want to tell you something."

"What is it?" I asked.

"If we can get this world back to normal, I would like to visit your world."

I couldn't believe he said that. I don't know how everyone would react to him being there. I mean, he's a monster. But, I couldn't say no.

"We'll see" I said. "Right now, we need to worry more on this world."

He nodded and we reached the outpost. All the other cars were parked outside, so we did the same. Sierra was waiting outside. She was a little shocked to see Dejaa and Monsiuer Goan, but I explained everything. She understood, and turned to the old shack. Instead of going in, she opened a panel and pressed a few buttons. The floor below us moved slightly, and then we traveled down. The opening above us closed behind so no one could follow us. The tunnel eventually hit the bottom, and we saw the rest of the gang here. They circled around a table, and we walked forward.

"How did the fight go?" asked Meta Knight.

"We won" I said.

"Poyo!" exclaimed Kirby.

"Good, we could use your help."

"What's wrong Meta Knight?"

He showed me a diagram of the prison. "This prison is nearly impossible to enter from the out side. The only way to enter the prison is to fly into it."

"Why go over when we can go under?"

"What does that mean?" asked Samus.

"We can tunnel our way under the prison. We should also do it somewhere else, so the enemies cannot follow us when we escape."

"That is an excellent plan!" said Olivia.

"Taylor, we need one of the monsters to help" said Tokkori.
115112111112111211111111211211111111.title: The Plan

1151121111121112111111112112111111111.content:
"I have a better idea Tokkori" I said.

I focused my energy, and six pokeballs appeared in my hands. Everyone stared at the items with complete shock and curiosity.

"Sire" said Slice n' Splice, "What are those?"

"Your world isn't the only world with monsters" I said.

I threw them all up in the air, and they all opened. I chose the six Pokemon that I owned that can use Dig. They were Checkers, Pine, Cada, Gabe, Scuttle, and Digger. Checkers is a Sandshrew, a yellow mouse Pokemon. His hard skin had the looks of a brick wall, but his was checkered with black and yellow, hence his name. Pine is a Forretress, a bug Pokemon encased within a hard shell. He had four extrusions that he used ine battle. Unlike most Forretresses, his shell was covered in yellow stars. Cada is a Ninjask, a wasp-like Pokemon. His wings were blue instead of clear like the others. Gabe is a Gabite, a Pokemon that looked like a cross from a shark and a dragon.. The dorsal fin on his back had a huge piece missing from it. Scuttle is a Crustle, a large crab-like Pokemon with a large boulder for a shell. Digger is an Excadrill, a large mole Pokemon. He had metal growths for claws, and one over its head. His face is white, and he had red markings on his chest. Everyone looked in astonishment, but Sierra looked a little to surprised. All of them except for Gabe rushed over to me, nearly knocking me down. Slice n' Splice ran up to them with his weapons held high, but I stopped him. Everyone got in line, and I began to introduce them.

"Everyone, these are my Pokemon" I said. "Pokemon are creatures that look like regular animals and have amazing abilities. The first one is Checkers."

Checkers rolled up into a ball and rolled around. He stopped at Olivia's feet and looked up at her. Olivia kneeled down and petted him. "Aww, he is so cute!" she said.

"The next one is Pine. He loves to spin."

Pine concluded my remark by spinning very fast. Cada flew over and landed on my head.

"This one is Cada. He is very fast and stealthy."

Cada flew off my head, and showed everyone his speed. It didn't seem like he was flying in a circle, he disappeared in one spot and reapeared in another. Gabe crossed his arms and leaned against the wall.

"The one over there is Gabe. He is cool, calm, but tough when you need him."

Gabe just waved one of his claws quickly, not wanting to be part of us.

"Why is Gabe like that?" asked Samus.

"Gabe is kinda solitary" I said. "He doesn't show it, but he does really care. Anyway, this crab is Scuttle. Underneath his rock-hard shell is a very gentle heart."

Scuttle walked over to Samus and made a bowing motion.

"The last one is Digger. He is probably the most powerful Pokemon out from my final team."

Digger raised his claws high and yelled. Meta Knight approached me with his cape drawn around him.

"How are these...Pokemon...going to help us?" he asked.

"I'll show you."
1151121111121112111111112112111111111.title: Go Go Pokemon!

11511211111211121111111121121111111111.content:
"Pine, come over here" I said.

Pine hovered his way near me, and he smiled. "Let's show everyone what you can do" I said. "Use Gyro Ball!"

Pine jumped in the air and spun rapidly. The extrusions shone a shining gray color, and created a belt around him. He stood in one spot, while I faced the others.

"Go on, attack him" I said. "Once Pine starts spinning, there is usually nothing that can stop him."

Dejaa spat out a bomb and hurled it at Pine. The bomb exploded, but Pine flew out of the smoke cloud and went near Dejaa. Dejaa jumped out of the way, and Pine flew around. Meta Knight jumped up and brought out his sword. He swung it at Pine, but it bounced off. You usually can't see his face, but he seemed surprised. Kirby shuffled his feet, and tried to inhale him. Pine spun around, and broke Kirby's suction. Everyone looked amazed. Pine stopped spinning, and met with the others. Everyone else met up with me.

"Now that is freaky!" said Tokkori.

"My sword has never failed to cut through anything" said Meta Knight. "These creatures could be useful after all."

"Let's do this!" said Olivia.
11511211111211121111111121121111111111.title: Show Meta Knight Pine's specialty

115112111112111211111111211211111111111.content:
All of us except for Mario, Luigi, Monsiuer Goan, and Olivia stayed behind. We needed to make sure that someone could open the door when we really needed it. We traveled about a few miles by foot away from the outpost. I still had all my Pokemon out, and they looked around the world with amazement. We stopped behind a hill where no one could see us.

"Everyone" I told my Pokemon, "We need to get into that prison. We need your help into tunneling under. Are you ready?"

All of my Pokemon cheered, and readied themselves. "Alright everyone, use Dig!" I said.

Checkers rapidly clawed the ground, eventually concealing himself underground. Pine spun rapidly and slammed into the ground. Cada flew full speed into the ground with his front claws moving very fast. Gabe jumped and buried himself. Crustle dug himself into the ground. Digger jumped, folded together, and spun rapidly. He burrowed his way into the ground. There were six holes in the side of the ground, but the ground eventually gave way. A giant tunnel appeared, big enough for Slice n' Splice to get through. We traveled through, and all my Pokemon were there. The tunnel continued behind them, it seems like they were already done.

"That was fast" said Samus.

"You guys are done already?" I asked.

All of them nodded, and we walked down further. The tunnel went up slightly, and it stopped. There was a small metal square tiles, and I lifted one. I slowly looked around. The hallways were clear, and covered in the same tiles. It seemed clear, so I climbed back down.

"Everything seems clear" I said. I returned my Pokemon, and looked around. I slowly removed the tiles, and everyone came up. Slice n' Splice barely made it up.

"What are we going to do now?" asked Sierra
115112111112111211111111211211111111111.title: Breakout

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
"We need to split up" I said. "We will have a better chance of finding the prisoners if we seperate."

Everyone agreed, and we split into two teams. I was with Slice n' Splice, Dejaa, Kirby, and Tokkori. We walked through the cybernetic hallways, where light went through the hallway's designs.

"I am surprised" said Slice n' Splice. "Usually prisons are supposed to be heavily guarded."

Five R.O.B.s appeared in front of us. These robots were brown, however. Five more droids came behind us. We circled around, to prevent them from grabbing us.

"You just had to say something" said Tokkori.

A R.O.B. fired a missle, and I prepared to inhale.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Short Excursion

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
Nothing happened. I tried again and again, but nothing happened. The R.O.B. fired the missle, and it landed right in front of me. Slice n' Splice caught me, and then sliced the R.O.B. that blasted me. Dejaa threw some bombs at the others so I could get back up.

"Sire, are you okay!?" asked Slice n' Splice.

"Why can't I use Kirby's ability?"

Suddenly, the markings on the walls turned red. Slice n' Splice's eyes glowed the same color, and he stopped talking and moving. He grabbed me and Dejaa, while the other R.O.B.s grabbed Kirby and Tokkori. They carried us to a room with many different computer screens. In the center of the room, was a large R.O.B. It was standing on a large platform and had many wires connected to it.

"You will not find the prisoners so easily" it said. Strangely, it had a female voice.

"Who are you?" I asked. "And why is Slice n' Splice like this?"

"I am what my creators refered to as Mother R.O.B. The robot that you refer to as Slice n' Splice is now under my control. I can control all electronical devices within this prison. Including small ones like your cell phone."

I did not know how she knew about that, but I tried to fight free. Slice n' Splice had my arms down, so I couldn't do much. I looked at Dejaa, and had an idea. I whispered my plan to him, and he nodded.

"Why are you trying to fight?' asked Mother R.O.B. "What can you possibly do in your current situation?"

"It's not what I can do, it's what my friend can do" I said. "Dejaa, now!"

Dejaa shot a bomb out of the top of his head, and it exploded. Slice n' Splice let go of us, and Deja freed Kirby and Tokkori.

"Slice n' Splice, attack the human" said Mother R.O.B.

Slice n' Splice raised the Moon Rod, and prepared to attack.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: We Have A Problem

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I felt a energy go through my body, and I fell to the ground. I rubbed my head and heard a voice.

"Ow! That hurt!" said a female voice.

I turned and almost screamed. Laying on the ground beside me, was a female version of me. It had brown hair, but was longer. Same colored eyes, and similar colored skin. There was a bow in her hair as well. Her body was shaped more like a girl, and her outfit was a different color. She stopped rubbing her head, and saw me. We both slowly got up, and looked at each other. Dejaa, Kirby, and Tokkori looked surprised as well. He both waved our right hand, almost mimicing the other.

"How interesting" said Mother R.O.B. "This robot has surprises. R.O.B. droids, send them to the cells."

Slice n' Splice grabbed me and...me, while the rest of the R.O.Bs grabbed the others. They blocked Dejaa's head so no more bombs would come out. They threw us into a cell, and Slice n' Splice slammed the door shut.

"Slice n' Splice, snap out of it!" I said.

He ignored me and walked away. Although I was mad, I just remembered about the other...me. I turned, and she was staring at me.

"Are...you...?" she asked.

"Alright" said Tokkori. "What in blue blazes is going on here?!"

"Slice n' Splice carrys a weapon that can split it's opponents into pieces and mix them up" I said, "Or..."

"It can split an enemy into its male and female personalities" said the other me.

"Very good..."

"Just call me Taylor."

"Tha's my name too."

"I figured that."

We heard a noise from one side of the hall, and we saw...
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Taylor and Taylor

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
"Sugar cubes!" Whispered a friendly female voice.
"Sierra, he doesn't know the code," replied Olivia angrily.
"So? I'm still gonna- HOLLYSHORTS!" Sierra yelled. She was stunned.
"Hi!" Me and girl Taylor said awkwardly.
"Who-" she stammered.
"A female version of me," I replied.
"How-"
"Slice n' Splice cut me, er, 'us',"
"What-"
"Some lady that has control of all electronics,"
"When-"
"Just few seconds ago,"
"Where-"
"Upstairs,"
She stopped and looked at Dedede. He was scooting across the floor on his butt like a dog.
"Why?" She sighed.
"Well, quit jabberin y'er jaw and get us outta here!" Tokkorie shouted.
Sierra nodded. She got out her necklace and closed her eyes. But nothing happened! She tilted her head in confusion, and tried again. It got the same results. She uttered a few cuss words and looked at us helplessly.
"This is one of the prisons I was telling you about," Meta Knight explained. "None of our true powers will work."
"Looks like we'll have to find another way to get you out..." Samus sighed.
Just then, Slice n' Splice entered. He looked mad and stormed into the room. He ran up and wacked Sierra. She flew back and hit the cage.
"That guy has some muscele..." She sighed before fainting.
Meta Knight tried fist fighting, but it proved useless. Slice n' Splice hit him through sevral walls. I looked at Slice n' Splice as he stompped to get Meta Knight. I looked down to see Sierra's charm necklace and Meta Knight's sword, Galaxia. I looked at Taylor and I could see she had the same idea as me.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Code Name: Sugar Cubes

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I lunged for Meta Knight's sword, Galaxia. I quickly stood back up, and faced Slice n' Splice. His eyes were still glowing red, just like the hallways. He raised both of his weapons to fight back. I stood with the sword facing him.

"Slice n' Splice" I said. "I don't want to hurt you. Please, snap out of it!"

He lunged forward with the Sun Rod. I dodged it, and hit him with the sword. I didn't want to cut him or destory him, so I just tried to hit him. Even Galaxia's power was drained here. Slice n' Splice kept swinging the two rods at me. The Moon Rod couldn't work on me again, so I didn't have to worry about getting split again. Still, the rods hitting me hurt as well. Eventually, I was knocked backwards. I slammed against the wall, and couldn't move. Slice n' Splice put the end of his Moon Rod to my neck. His arm was moving slightly, like he was resisting. I felt something on my face, and I felt it. A small cut was on my face, and it was bleeding. R.O.B. droids came to the hall, and surrounded us. I saw more of Slice n' Splice move slightly, and a voice came on.

"Very good Slice n' Splice" said Mother R.O.B. "Now, finish the inferior organics!"

Slice n' Splice slowly moved the Moon Rod and raised it above his head. I closed my eyes, waiting for the final blow. I heard a small explosion, and opened my eyes. Slice n' Splice sliced a R.O.B droid in half, and it exploded. He turned to me, and his eyes were back to normal. I smiled, and he took out the rest of the droids. We led the others into the main room where Mother R.O.B was. Her eyes shined red, and several large wires shot out. They entangled us all, she brought me closer to her.

"How did you make Slice n' Splice get out of my control?" she asked.

"I didn't do anything" I said. "I guess that he did it himself."

The robot's eyes glowed again, and the wires glowed red. A coursing electric flow went through me body. The others were experiencing the same thing. Everything felt painful. I tried to look around to see if anything I could use to get out of this. I saw a loose spark out of on of the wires, and saw Kirby.

"Kirby, suck up the spark!" I said.

Kirby managed to use his inhale ability, and sucked up the loose spark. He turned yellow, and loose sparks formed on his head. A metal band with a blue orb in the middle of it appeared at the border of the two. Kirby let loose a lot of sparks, destroying the wire surrounding him. He landed on the ground, but Mother R.O.B laughed.

"Make on move, and I will fry all of these organics!" she said.

Suddenly, there was a loud explosion. Everyone fell down, and I turned and saw...
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Sword Fight

choices: Mother ROB and the entire prison became overloaded with power
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I turned and saw two people. One was Solid Snake, a army soldier dressed in a gray suit and wore a brown headband. The other was Samus in her armor. although I couldn't see her face, I could tell she was glad to be back in her armor. She fired more beams of energy, and the wires were cut one by one. Me and Taylor ran up to her, where she dimed the light on her visor so we could she her face. She still seemed surprised to see us like the way we are. We were interrupted by more wires being shot out of the ground around us. Before any of us did anything, Taylor jumped in midair and kicked one of the wires. She went straight through the wire, and the wire disintigrated. Taylor stood up, turned around, and smiled.

The only thing I said was "Wow..."
