"Why couldn't you do that?" asked Samus.

"Well, she is the female side of my personality. Maybe she has different skills than me."

I broke out of my daze and at least tried to fight. Mother R.O.B. was putting up a good fight. Spark Kirby was putting out a massive amount of sparks, but Mother ROB looked like she was absorbing that power. I had to destroy her completely, but the only power I had was know gone. I just remembered that I still have my unlimited Pokemon with me. I saw Mother ROB's strength, and knew what to do.

I focused my power, and brought out every Pokemon that could use an Electric-type move. I sent out TNT the Electrode, Static the Ampharos, Nora the Aggron, Alex the Ambipom, Dynamo the Eelektross, Amp the Stunfisk, Jolt the Galvantula, and Clink the Klinklang. A Electrode looked like a pokeball with a face, only the design was upside down. TNT had a black lightning bolt-shaped marking on his forhead. A Ampharos was a yellow mammallian pokemon that slightly resembled a bare sheep. Static had a orb on the end of her tail that had a pink heart on it. Aggrons are large Pokemon covered in steel armor. Nora was a sweet girl, but was a little mischevious. Ambipoms resembled monkeys that have two tails. On the end of each tail, resembled a hand. Eelektross looked like a blue eel, with arms that looked similar to is mouth, long fins, and long body. Stunfisks looked similar to a Stargazer, whose bodies are completely flat. Galvantulas are big, yellow and blue hairy spiders. Jolt had a black fabric wrapped around each of his front feelers. Klinklang resembled giant gears that constantly stayed in motion. I commanded all of them to use their electric moves, and they did it. All of the attacks were absorbed by Mother ROB.

"Ignorant organic" she said. "That will only make me stronger!"

I ignored her and commanded my Pokemon to continue. Mother ROB laughed as we did this.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Ultimate Destruction

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
Mother ROB was still laughing at us. It almost looked like it pleased her. Then, a loose spark flew out of her. Mother ROB stop laughing and looked around in horror. She was sparking loose streams of electricity. Her voice began to glitch, the screens around her were noe filled with static, and her body moved violently. Eventually, she exploded. Parts of her flew everywhere, covering the room's floor. All of my Pokemon rushed over to me, and I told them how well they did. However, the room glowed red again.

"Sixty seconds till self destruct" said a voice that sounded similar to Mother ROB's.

"What are we going to do!?" asked Sierra.

"We have to escape!" I said.

We all ran out of that room, and headed towards the tunnel. The countdown was know on thirty seconds. We all hurried in, as we ran for our lives. Just before we left the tunnel, the prison exploded. Exhausted and relieved, we went back to the outpost. I had to admit, I kinda liked being split. I had someone to talk to that knew everything about each other. It was awkward, but kinda interesting. It was almost like talking to yourself; literally. We got to the outpost, and relaxed. Everyone got some food, while Slice n' Splice wanted to see me and Taylor.

"Sire, I need to ask you something" he said.

"What is it?" I replied.

"Do you want me to join you two back together?"
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Your not my Mom!

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
"Sorry Slice n' Splice" I said. "But, let Taylor stay. I know that it might be a little awkward having someone that is almost 100% like me, but I think I will get used to it."

Slice n' Splice bowed and left us alone. Taylor walked over to me afterward.

"Why is he so obedient?" she asked.

"I nearly rescued Slice n' Splice from getting destroyed" I replied. "He has been loyal to me ever since. And, I kinda like having you out here. I find it a lot more comforting that there is some one I definitly know to trust."

I saw Taylor blush a little, and we followed the others. Monsiuer Goan wanted to be sent back, but Dejaa wanted to stay. We met up with everyone again to discuss the plan.

"Taylor" said Snake, "I know you have been the leader from the start. But, if you don't mind, I would like to propose a plan."

"That is fine" I replied.

"Now then, there are two prisons near this outpost. They are around the same distance from this one. Now, I propose that we split into two teams and each one rescue the prisoners. How does that sound?"

"That sounds like a plan" I said. "And since you came up with the plan, you can choose the teams."

"Alright then. I'll go with Samus, Olivia, Meta Knight, Mario, and Luigi. Taylor, you, Taylor, and Slice n' Splice seem to be getting along well. And Kirby seems to be becoming friends with you as well, along with Sierra."

Dejaa walked over to Snake and said something.

"Dejaa wants to go with Snake Taylor" said Slice n' Splice."

"Snake, make sure Dejaa stays safe" I said.

"Will do Taylor" he replied.

"And Dejaa, make sure the rest of these guys are safe as well."

Dejaa nodded, and we headed out. We drove our seperate ways, and we were just within sights of the next prison. In the distance, we saw...
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: New Plan

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
Out in the distance, was another castle. But, this castle was different, and seemed very familiar. It was entirely black, and decorated very creepily. It almost seemed that all hope and love was being drained from me as I looked at it. Taylor and Slice n' Splice saw my reaction. Taylor understood it as much as I did.

"What is wrong sire?" asked Slice n' Splice.

I turned on my intercom to tell the rest of the gang. "Everyone, do you know who's castle this is?" I asked.

"No" said Sierra.

"Whosever it is, they did a very lousy job decorating" said Olivia.

"Taylor, I know who's castle that is" said Taylor. "That is Wilfre's Castle."

"Who the heck is Wilfre?" asked Tokkori. Even through it was through the intercom, his voice still sounded annoying.

"Wifre is a character from the game Drawn to Life. He was the villian that tried to destory the entire world of color, and imagination. The only thing that stopped him was the hero you created. I enjoyed both of those games."

"Well which game is the castle from?" asked Slice n' Splice.

"Well, Wilfre owned a castle in both games" said Taylor. "It made a better appearance in the second game though. What's worse is that the castle is heavily guarded. We need to distract some of the guards to enter.

"Let us handle that" I said with Slice n' Splice. "Just drop us off here, and wait fro the signal."

"What's the signal?" asked Sierra.

"You'll know it when you see it."

We stopped the car and me and Slice n' Splice jumped out. Taylor went into the driver's seat, "Are you sure I can drive this thing?"

"You're me" I replied, "You should be able to drive this thing."

She nodded and met the others. Slice n' Splice walked over to me as I opened my cell phone. Broom King appeared and looked worried.

"Are you alright Taylor?" he asked. "We couldn't get a hold of you earlier."

"We're fine" I said. "Now then, we need Sasuke and Delivery Man."

"Why?"

"We need them both to enter a prison."

"Alright, now sending data."

The light shot out of my phone, and Sasuke was the first to appear. Sasuke was a small round monster. It wore one of those round chinese hats on it's head. Delivery Man came out next. He looked like a hard-core motorcycleist with a super fast motorcycle.

"Sasuke, we need fireworks" I said. "How fast can you make them?"

Sasuke saluted and went right to work. "Delivery Man, once Sasuke gets done with the fireworks, we need you to place them on the right side of the castle. Then, we need your help to get insdie the castle."

He nodded, and I went to Sasuke. I sat down beside him, but he turned to work on them.

"I understand" I said. "Your fireworks need complete concentration to be very good. And by the way, they are."

I saw that Sasuke glanced at me for a second, and then handed me some stuff. He motioned that I simply pour the two powders into each other. I did as he did, and handed me a a set of containers of multicolored powders.

"I can choose which color?" I asked.

He nodded and went back to his work. I chose blue, since it was my favorite color. I looked back at Sasuke, and he finsihed a lot more than me. I was surprised, and he looked smug. Delivery Man grabbed all of the fireworks and rushed over. He came back in a matter of seconds. Sasuke grabbed a remote, and pressed it. Several fireworks fired up, and they looked amazing.

"Ready guys?" I asked.

They all nodded, and we prepared. Suddenly, a white vortex opened behind us and swallowed us. We then appeared in a cage. we looked around, and saw...
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Wilfre's Castle

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
There was a pile of different objects in front of me. There was a pile of instruments, a jar full of color, and something that looked like plants. They all seemed useless to be in here.

"Why are these things in here?" asked Tokkori.

"It just looks like a pile of junk" said Olivia.

"Wait a minute!" I said.

I walked over to the pile of instruments first. There were many instruments, but there was also a stereo system in there too. I grabbed each item, and placed it on the floor carefully. After a time of arranging the items, I finally recognized it.

"It's Meganote!" I exclaimed.

"Who?" asked Slice n' Splice.

"Meganote was one of the heros I created in the game. Meganote was a living combination of musical instruments. But, since the cell has the power to drain other powers, he is just a pile of instruments. The other two are TreeBark and Spectra."

The cell door opened, and two rounded white ghosts appeared. I grabbed one of Meganote's speakers and faced it to the ghosts.

"Meganote" I said, "If you can hear me, we could use your help!"

The speaker started to shake, and sound waves blasted out of it. The ghosts dissappeared, and the cage was left open. I grabbed as many instruments as I could, and the others grabbed them. We left out of that cage, but I stopped. I looked in the other cells to see if anymore people were in there. I saw the remaining heros. I also saw Pit in one of the cages as well. Pit saw me, and walked to the front of the bars.

"Whoever you are, get me out!" he said.

"Relax" I said. "I will get you out."

"Yeah, I would like to see you try."

I focused my energy. If this is Wilfre's castle, and my heros are here, that means that I am the creator. I should be able to make anything of I concentrate. A key formed in my hand, and I placed it in the lock to the cell dor. It fit percectly, and it opened. Pit looked surprised, but he was too worried about getting out. I opened the other cages, and grabbed the rest of the heros. Once I got out, all of the items started to shake. The rearranged themselves into the heros I created them to be. The first one was the first one, and his name was Stumpy. Stumpy was a blue creature that only hand one eye, one arm, and one leg. He had a black spiral on his chest, a few scars on his body, and an x where his other eye should be. He looked at me, and hopped my way. He managed a hug, and turned to watch the others. The next one was TreeBark. TreeBark is a living plant with large wings made of branches and leaves. The next one was Marine. Marine was a mix up of several different species of sea creatures. He had the legs of a crab, but onlt two of them. He has one arm with a sea anenome for a hand, and the other arms was normal, except he had webbeed hands. The gills were located below his arms on the sides of his body, his head had an octopus beak, fins on his head, and blue eyes. The color of his skin changed depending on what body part was where. Plus, he could change the parts to something else as will. The last of the first series was Shadow. Shadow was a hero based on wilfre's old henchmen. He was an entire being made of darkness. I used him to fight Wilfre in the end. Fight fire with fire. They all looked excited to see me. Everyone else took some time to get used to them, but then the others started to form.

"How many of these blasted scribbles are there?" asked Tokkori.

"Hey!" said Shadow. "We may be poorly drawn, but at least we can fight!"

The first of the second series to form was Meganote. Like I said before, Meganote is a living combination of several different musical instruments. His body was a stereo system, topped with two speakers. Inbetween these two speakers was his head. His head was white, and he had a music note-like mask covering his eyes. He had four arms and three legs; each one a different instrument. The next one was Scrapper. Scrapper was a robot that did not look very well constructed. He had four legs and three arms. One of his arms was like a human hand, one was a robotic claw, and another looked like a large spike. His legs resembled crab legs. The third was Bot. Bot was more of a junk bot than Scrapper. He has one arm, ended with a oddly shaped hand. He has a spring for a leg, and his body is cylinderical. His head was spherical, and his eye was red. The last one was Spectra. Spectra was similar to Shadow, but he was a variety of colors. They all looked at each other with happiness, and then they saw me. They all looked at me with a combinatio of worry and happiness. The others arrived, and they all got into battle poses.

"Hey wait!" I said. "These guys are not enemies! They are my creations!"

Taylor walked up to them, and they all looked at her in surprise. They turned between me and her constantly. I didn't want to tell them what happened, because they might attack Slice n' Splice.

"what happened to you guys?" I asked.

"We went to Wilfre's cstle to stop him from doing any harm" said Stumpy.

"Unfortuantly, we did not count on those strange powers of those holding cells" said Meganote.

"When we entered, we fell apart" said Scrapper.

Small shadows appeared around us, and creatures that looked like Shadow appeared. They circled around us, and was pushing us to another room. In the room, was...
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: The Heros

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
Wilfre was sitting on a high pedestal in a throne. He held his scepter in his right hand, and was looking down on us.

"Well well" he said. "Looks like the little creations got free. My question is, who are the rest of you?"

"The question is, who are you?" asked Sierra.

"That is Wilfre" I said. "He is the creep that wants to remove all imagination and creativity from the world, and rule it all!"

"I am surprised by how much you know" he said. Wilfre raised his scepter towards me, and a beam fired. It surrounded me, and lifted me into the air. Slice n' Splice tried to stop him, but Wilfre's creatures stopped him. Wilfre brought me closer near his face. He smiled wickedly as he brought the scepter to my forehead. I was actually slightly scared.

"W-What are...you g-going to d-do?" I stammered.

He just smiled, as a coursing pain went through my body. I felt something getting pulled out of my head, and it solidified outside of my body and into Wilfre's other hand. The pain stopped, and he threw me down. The creatures dissappeared, and Slice n' Splice caught me. I gained consciousness and faced him.

"What did you do?" I asked.

"I just sampled your mind" he said. "Now, we will have a proper battle. I will change the arena to suit the battle."

He waved the scepter and the walls quickly spread out. we all looked around, but I paid more attention to Wilfre. He had something in his hands, that looked similar to a book. It did not look like the Book of Life, but it was definitly a book. He smiled as he came upon a certain page.

"This one will do" he said. He fired a beam from his scepter, and a cloud of smoke formed. Out from the smoke, stood a massive machine. The machine was purely white. It had four crab-like mechanical legs, which had shield-like armor on the foreleg. It's body was semi-circular, with several different machines out of it. The smaller one resembled small cannons, and there was an extremely large one with a large satellite dish on top. It was decorated with yelow markings. It had a big yellow eye in the center of its body. I backed up slowly, and the others did as well.

"What is that contraption?" asked Tokkori.

"i don't believe it!' I said. "it's Cannon Crawler!"

"Cannon what?" asked Olivia.

"Something I created when I was a little kid. It was a war weapon that had nearly no weakness."

Cannon Crawler began to walk forward and fired its small cannons. We dodged the attack, and hid behind the pillars. Thankfully, Cannon Crawler was very slow.

"How do we defeat it?" asked Sierra.

"Cannon Crawler's armor is nearly indestrucible" I replied. "The only way to destroy it is from the inside."

"How can we get in if the armor is indestructible?" asked Olivia.

"There is an access vent directly under Cannon Crawler. If one of us can distract him, one of us can get in."

Slice n' Splice ran around and started to attack Cannon Crawler. Cannon Crawler started after him, while I made my way under Cannon Crawler. The latch was visible, but it was stragnely sealed shut. Slice n' Splice was getting hit pretty good. I created a wrench to try to get it open, but it wouldn't work. I ran out, and pushed Slice n' Splice. Some of the heros grabbed him and ran behind some cover.

"The latch is sealed!' I said. "I have no way in!"

"Kirby, get that thing!" said Tokkori.

Kirby ran out and shufled his feet.

"Kirby wait!" I exclaimed.

Kirby began using his inhale ability. Cannon Crawler just stood there. Kirby's power was failing, but he kept trying.

"If Kirby keeps this up, he will get too tired to even fight!' said Olivia.

"Don't even try Kirby!" said Wilfre. "When I sampled Taylor's mind, I also sampled all of his knowledge as well. I removed everything that you can use!"

"Taylor, what re we going to do?" asked Sierra.

"Let's see, Wilfre said that he removed everything that Kirby could ever use" I said. "But, if Kirby had a new transformation, Wilfre wouldn't know about it!"

"How can we create a new Kirby?" asked Olivia.

"I have the powers of the Creator, where I can nearly create almost anything. But, wilfre took most of it, so I can only do little stuff. all I have to do is think of one."

"I will try too" said Taylor.

I looked down at the wrench at my hand, and back at Kirby.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Wilfre Battle Part 1!

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I threw the wrench near Kirby's mouth and he sucked it in. Wilfre laughed at my attempt.

"What will that do?" he said.

I concentrated, and then Kirby jumped and flipped in the air. A brown bandana with a darker brown star on it appeared on his head. A large wrench appeared in his hand as well. Kirby looked at himslef in surprise, as well as everyone else. Wilfre was looking through my book to try and find that transformation.

"I can't find that one anywhere in here!" he said while flipping the pages rapidly.

"I figured out how this place can work" I said. "This place increases my imagination's power and my creation powers as well as your powers. I created a new Kirby transformation. Say hello to...Mechanic Kirby!"

"What a rediculous name!" said Wilfre. "Cannon Crawler, destory Kirby!"

Cannon Crawler turned and aimed all of his cannons at Kirby. Kirby threw his wrench at Cannon Crawler, who was knocked back. Kirby caught the wrench after it recoiled.

"Kirby!" I yelled, "HIt him with the Disassemble Beam!"

"What?" asked Olivia.

"Kirby spun his wrench, and a white sphere of energy formed in the middle. A beam shot out from it, and encased Cannon Crawler. Nothing happened for a few seconds, and Cannon Crawler began to walk. Suddenly, he started to fall apart in pieces. The color drained from the parts, and Cannon Crawler dissappeared. Wilfre looked mad and threw his arms in his chair.

"I will get something from your imagination that can win!" he said.

"I wouldn't say that" said Slice n' Splice.

Pit flew back down to us, with the book in his hands. I grabbed the book, and it quickly dissolved in my hands. I could feel the knowledge being absorbed through my skin. Wilfre looked even more mad, but he then stopped and smiled.

"Your creations might not win" he said, "But I now who can."

Wilfre waved his scepter in the air, and black smoke surrounded us. The smoke cleared from around me, but only the heros from the game were around me. I tried to look for the rest of the gang, but I was interrupted by laughter. Wilfre was sitting in a large throne that was on top of a cloud. He was like he was in the end of the second game. I heard some rumbling from the smoke. The smoke cleared, and I saw every boss from the game. There was Frostwind, Deadwood, Angler King, Wilfre's pet scorpion, Bakibeard, Giant Robosa, and Council Defenses. Each one looked evil and ready to battle. I was more worried about my friends.

"Where are my friends Wilfre!?" I yelled.

He pointed his scepter behind me, and I turned around. The others were in a cage emtirely made of shadow. I turned back around, and looked at Wilfre. He was laughing a lot.

"I'm going to make you an offer" he said. "If you and your heros can defeat these enemies, I will release you and your friends. How does that sound?"
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Wilfre Battle Part 2

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
"We accept your deal" I said.

Marine and Meganote walked up, "We will fight!"

Wilfre smiled and waved his scepter, "Which heros will I defeat first? up, and Meganote followed. "We wish to fight!" they said.

"Very well" said Wilfre. "It will be two on two. Looks like Bakibeard and Angler King will be fighting."

The arena was surrounded and smoke, and I could feel myself moving. The smoke began to clear, and everything became visible. Me and the other heros were standing on a large platform. The arena was now a full water battlefield. However, Bakibeard's ship was floating in the water. Bakibeard was on the ship, and Angler King was slightly above water. Marine and Meganote were right on the edge of the platform. I gave Marine his custom Starshooter. It was a blue gun with a yellow star on the side. Marine dove into the water, and Angler King swam deeper. Meganote began playing the Boss Battle music on his speakers, and he made his way down as well. I couldn't see Marine, so I had to pay attention to Magenote. As he was playing music, music notes were surrounding him. They shot out at Bakibeard, but they passed right through. He laughed and disappeared. He reappeared behind Meganote, and scared him. Smaller ghosts started to appear, and they went to Meganote. They were in the formation of a flight of stairs. Meganote kept trying to use his sound attack, but they passed right through.

"Meganote!" I yelled."Use the ghosts! You can't hit him with sound!"

Meganote jumped and hit one of the ghosts. The ghost disappeared, and he was launched higher. Meganote did the same to all the ghosts, and slammed into Bakibeard. Bakibeard disappeared, and reappeared at the opposite end of the ship. He sent out several ghosts, who surrounded Meganote. They picked him up, and threw him overboard. Bakibeard laughed and he traveled deeper.

"Wilfre!" I yelled. "This isn't fair!"

"Hey, did you expect the battle to be exactly like the game?" he said. "And this time, you can't help them. A true hero must learn on their own."

I looked down at the bubbling water where Meganote once was. But, Meganote isn't suited for underwater.

---

Marine and Angler King were fighting wildly. Marine shooting his Starshooter and using his powers, while Angler King was sending out Shadow Fish. A loud splash was heard, and they both looked up. Meganote was falling deeper into the water. Marine tried to swim up, but Angler King stopped him. Marine became surrounded in electricity, and stunned Angler King. Marine swam up to Meganote, who was faintly playing his song. He turned to Marine, who was trying to get him above water. Bakibeard slowly descended, and Angler King broke out of his daze. Meganote said something faintly.

"Ma..rine" he said. "Use...this..."

Music notes surrounded Marine, and he started to glow. The light eventually illuminated the entire area.

---

I suddenly saw the entire water glow white. Bakibeard rose out of the water and Angler King surfaced. A large veil of water was beginning to form, and then it eventually burst. Out of the water, looked like a giant, monsterous version of Marine. He looked around, and then raised his one hand. The hand looks like a sea anenome. The tentacles stretched out and surrounded Angler King and Bakibeard. Electricity flowed through the tentacles, and electrocuted them. Eventually, they disappeared, and Marine shrunk back down.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Meganote and Marine vs Bakibeard and Angler King

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
Meganote laid there on the floor. No sound was coming out of him, his eyes were closed, and his body was motionless. I ran up and kneeled beside him. I laid my ear close to his chest, trying to hear anything. I heard nothing. I laid my head against his chest and nearly cried. Then, a faint sound emitted from his speakers. As it grew louder, the other instruments on him began to play. He opened his eyes, and smiled at me. I hugged him, and I heard clapping. Wilfre was clapping sarcastically.

"How touching" he said. "But we have a battle to complete. And this time, I'm choosing first. Frostbite, Giant Robosa, you two are up."

Frostbite flew to the main field and Giant Robosa walked. The water battlefield solidified in the center to serve as a platform. Stumpy and Scrapper walked forward. I made a bridge connecting the two areas, and they crossed. I gave Stumpy his Snow Shooter, a white gun with a black spiral on it, and gave Scrapper his slinger, a large gray metal ball with a black decal on it and attached to a chain. Once they crossed, the bridge dissappeared. A pillar of snow topped stone formed under Stumpy, and several more came up as well. The water turned to lava, and the stone lengthened. Frostbite flew up to Stumpy, and Giant Robosa sank in the lava.

There are two battles now, I got to try and watch them both.

Frostbite breathed icy wind, and Stumpy jumped to another pillar. He fired his Snow Shooter, and hit Frostbite. I turned to Scrappet, and he was doing good as well. He was dodging the attacks very well. Giant Robosa was having a very hard time attacking. Wilfre waved his scepter, and lava columns spewed out. Scrapper got distracted, and Giant Robosa knocked him up. Scrapper knocked into Frostbite, and bounced off and hit Stumpy. Both Stumpy and Frostbite were falling into the lava. Frostbite fell in, but Stumpy was flailing. I saw Scrapper extend his legs across some pillars, and then extended his arms. He grabbed Stumpy, and slowly brought him up.

"See how extra limbs can be useful?" said Scrapper.

"I prefer to have what I got" replied Stumpy.

They stayed on the stone column, but Giant Robosa stood up. He breathed in trying to suck them up, but Scrapper implanted his feet.

"Scrapper! Stumpy!" I yelled. "Let the Robosa inhale you! Once inside, find it's heart and destroy it! That will defeat it!"

I saw them both nod, and Scrapper let go. Giant Robosa inhaled them completely.

Good luck...

---

I landed inside of the Giant Robosa. Stumpy fell flat on his face, but he was alright. I recovered my Slinger, and Stumpy found his Snow Shooter. For someone with only one arm and leg, he can sure manage well.

"Alright, I'm ready" he said.

"Good " I replied, "Now, according to Taylor, we can destro the Robosa if we destroy the heart."

"Lets go!"

We ran down the only hallway, filled with moving gears and lava flowing. This machine must use the lava to function. After a while, we came into what appeared to be the center chest area. In the center of the room, was a metal heart shaped object. It had a few feats attached to it, and was beating.

"$5 says that that is the heart" said Stumpy.

We wandered closer, but an alarm went off. Some missile launchers appeared and aimed at us.

"Since you have a projectile weapon" I said, "You aim for the heart. I'll cover you,"

He nodded and we jumped into action. Missiles fire, but I spun my Slinger to keep the missiles occupied. Stumpy had a clear shot. But when he fired, the snow melted.

"It's too hot in here" he said.

"Switch positions" I replied.

He fired at the missiles, which exploded on contact. My Slinger made several dents in the heart until it finally went through. The heart exploded, and then the entire room shook.

---

I watched as Giant Robosa had a shocked look on his face, and he screamed. Lights enjoyed from him, and he exploded.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Scrapper and Stumpy vs Giant Robosa and Frostbite

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
Out from the explosion, two figures emerged. It was Stumpy and Scrapper. Scrapper landed on his feet, but Stumpy fell falt on his face. Scrapper helped him up, and Stumpy smiled. Wilfre was furious.

"No no no! Why does everything end bad for me!" he said.

He raised his scepter, and the battlefield changed. "Deadwood, Council Defences, get in there!"

Deadwood sunk into the ground and popped up somewhere else. The tank rolled up and began to power up. TreeBark spreaded his wings and his Acorn Laucher appeared. I focused, and Bot's ship appeared. His ship looked like a round UFO, with two satelitte dishes on each side. The dome on top was clear. A yellow ring was across the middle of it. He hopped up, opened the hatch, jumped in, and inputed his one hand inside the control panel. The ship started up and began to hover.

"What was that for?" asked TreeBark.

(Author's note: Bot cannot speak properly, He can only speak in bits.)

"I ca ake tota ontrol of my ip with m arm" Bot replied. "Atch"

His ship raised, spun around quickly, stopped, and his satelitte dishes moved. TreeBark smiled, but he was interupted by missles. They each flew in, then a black fog blocked my view.

"Hey Wilfre!" I exclaimed. :What's with the fog?!"

"You helped the last two teams out" he replied, "But your not helping this one out!"

I turned to just see the black smoke.

---

The smoke behind us blocked our view. Taylor could not help us now. It was probably wilfre. I turned to Bot.

"Looks like we are on our own" I said.

"Let do is!" he said.

I believe he said "Let's do this!" Bot was kinda wierd, but he was pretty nice. I had to think a little more to understand him. Deadwood was accompanied by the tank. Shadow Bats flew out of his branches, and headed towards us. I raised my Acorn Launcher, but Bot took the first shots. I fired my weapon afterwards.

"Wha ill at o?" he asked.

"Wait for it" I replied.

A single acron hit a bat at the front, then the acorn split into fragments. More bats were destroyed in the process. Deadwood yelled, but more came out.

There has to be a way to defeat him.

I looked at the branches, and saw pinecones. They each had a face on them, and matched Deadwood's emotions.

"Bot, I have...!"

He slammed his ship against me. I looked to the side, where a lazer fired. I looked down, and saw that tank. Before a lazer forms, a light shines in place of it.

"Bot, we need to get to Deadwood's branches" I said. "If we take out the pinecones on his branches, then we can defeat him!"

"Alrigh" he replied.

Suddenly, Shadow Bats flew all around us.

"Old on!" said Bot.

I dug my roots into part of the ship's hul. Bot looked mad, but he continued his plan. The two dishes began to move rapidly, and the entire ship began to fire. I just noticed that the ship shot blue orbs of energy. The bats were quickly defeated, and a loose ball of energy hit a pinecone and destroyed it. Deadwood screamed in pain, and the entire room shook. We looked at each other, and nodded. I flew off to get the pinecones, Bot went to distract the tank. I managed to get rid of two more, until I saw the light. I moved before it fired. I saw the last pinecone, and the light again. I flew in front of the pinecone, and waited for the lazer. At the last second, I flew away to get out away from the lazer.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Bot and TreeBark vs Council Defences and Deadwood

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I felt a large surge of pain as I got hit with the laser. My left wing was completely destroyed. The pain was unbearable and I quickly fell. However, I hit a hard sheet of metal. I turned and saw Bot with his ship. He smiled at me but a loud scream filled the air. Deadwood was screaming in terrible agony with his mouth wide open. The bottom of his mouth and his eyes were no longer visible. A small alarm sounded in Bot's ship, and he looked worried.

"What's...going...on...?" I managed to ask.

Bot just pointed to Deadwood, who's mouth was open. One of the leaves that fell from my damaged wing fell off and quickly sucked into his mouth. I saw the tank having trouble moving. The ship itself was being sucked in as well. I hung on for dear life as we entered his mouth. Everything was black at first, but something sparked. It was the remains of Bot's ship. Bot was beside it, looking very sad. Everything inside Deadwood was hollow. I saw that the tank started back up again and aimed at us. Suddenly, the entire room shook. Tentacles made of shadow formed all over the edge of Deadwood's body. It entangled the tank and completely destroyed it. A shadowy figure crawled on the top and then slammed on the ground. It had two arms, and a long curled tail that it used to stand up on.

"Wilfre...corruption...darkness..." it said.

"Who are you?" I asked.

"I....Deadwood..."

He lunged at us but both of us managed to dodge it. My left wing was still damaged, so I couldn't do much. For some odd reason, Deadwood was only attacking Bot. He had no weapon either. I grabbed my Acorn Launcher and threw it.

"Bot catch!"

Bot jumped high with his spring leg and caught it. He rapid fired at Deadwood, hitting everytime. Deadwood started to fade, and Bot kept firing. Deadwood moaned in pain, and disappeared. A gust of wind blew us out, and the entire room shook. Deadwood's body glowed brighter and soon exploded. The dark mist cleared and everyone was revealed. Wilfre looked steamed.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Battle from the Inside Out

choices: Gerel's point of view and/or joins the group
Gerel leaves and/or point of view switch
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
(ok I'm not yet sure how to make the other guys in the story react(I'll also post this to Writer12))
Male Talyor's point of view: "If you want something done right you have to do it yourself." Wilfre mutters raising his staff and charging a beam as the others got in their fighting stances, ready to jump out of the way.
"Not so fast!" barks a mysterious figure on top of the wall behind.
"And who are you?" asks Wilfre.
The mysterious man jumps down and lands surprisingly lightly."Your executioner." he states coldly. Now that he's closer I can see a few details. He's about 5"6" and totally covered in what looks like a black, stealth, combat suit with a few pockets all along the body.
"You think you can kill me!" Wilfre laughs mocking this man. He didn speak, he just crouched in a ninja stance and ran at Wilfre and while running he pulled his short sword halfway out, jumped in the air and pulled it out, and swung at Wilfre who blocked with his staff.
Strangers point of view: What is this guy? He thinks, then Wilfre shoots sharp threads of shadows at me. I manage to dodge most, but then so many came at me almost like a wave so I use substitution jutsu so he only destroys a log as I appear behind him."Damn! I better finish this quick" I whisper to myself.
"There you are!!" Wilfre roars, charging a powerful beam and getting ready to send more sharp shadow.
I make a handsign putting my first two fingers together and holding them vertically while my other hand is infront making a cross or plus sign with my fingers. "Multi-Shadow Clone Jutsu!!" I yell creating fifty or more clones. We all create a Rasendori and charge at him"Rasendori! From all directions!" we yell at the same time hitting him simultaneously. The clones disappear as the shockwave hits them shaking the castle and I'm standin with the others who are also trying not to get blown away.
Nothing was left of Wilfre afterwards. I pull out a syringe and inject a srum in my neck, a combo of nanobots and vital nutrients to give me a boost. Then I turn around toward the others and introduce myself,"Sorry if you guys had everything under control. I just thought I'd lend a hand considering the badguy was easy to find. I'm Gerel by the way, Gerel Hatake."
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Wilfre's turn

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
The group stood in shock. Princess Sierra walked forward and claimed Wilfre's staff. As she lifted it, a cloud of black ink scattered and went through a crack in the wall, laughing all the way.
"... I knew he wouldn't perish... He's empowered with shadow bugs, along with his ink..." Sierra mumbled. She reached into her white elbow length gloves and pulled out a small pouch. She took out some powder that looked like powdered sugar, and tossed it on to Wilfre's staff, causing it to shrink down to the size of an index finger.
"Here Kirby, hold onto this please," she said as she handed Kirby the staff. Kirby took it and put in his mouth and swallowed it whole.
"So wait... You're Gerel Hatake?" Male Taylor asked.
"Yea, I was strolling through and saw you guys here. I thought I might help out, I hope that it was okay," Gerel explained.
"Even if we had managed to beat Wilfre ourselves, the outcome would've been the same," Olivia sighed.
"Well, at least Slice n' Splice got off easy," Female Taylor said as she examined Splice n' Splice's damage. "And the others look fine as well!" She exclaimed. Meganote was over in a corner playing around with his stereos, while Scrapper and Stumpy were over napping, and Bot and Tree Bark were a little dazed. Cannon Crawler was hobbling around and seemed very confused. He walked over to male Taylor and looked at him with his single eye.
"Cannon Crawler?" Taylor asked.
Cannon Crawler buzzed and whirred with joy.
"He must've been manipulated by the shadow bugs," Meta Knight observed.
"Yea, well, Gerel if you want to join us feel free to. Your help was very useful. Right now, we're looking for our comrades," Sierra explained.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Wilfre Got Away

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
Gerels whole body trembles for a second before he grunts out,"Sure thing. Always ready to help out." But, when Gerel takes a single step he stumbles and after a quick gasp from Sierra, she catches Gerel supporting him with one arm over her.
"Are you OK?" Asks Sierra looking worried.
"Yeah I'm fine. Just been through a lot before coming here. Long story short lots of fighting, me against many tough people, got hurt badly, had to leave before I died. While my injuries healed during the portal trip here, wherever the heck here is, I came here and tried to end the battle quickly so the enemy couldn't take advantage of my weakness." Gerel responds weakly as he stands up himself."I'm afraid that until I have time to recover I won't be of much help in battle"
Male Taylor says encouragingly,"Don't worry. We can take care of the battles."
Samaus then says"Yeah. That's what friends are for after all. Right?"
"Yeah. Your right." Gerel sighs,"I just hate to be a burden. So now, let's hurry up and find your friends so I can recover somewhere." Gerel states.
The part leaves the room and searches the castle checking every room until....
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: They Explore Wilfre's Castle

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
As the party searched the castle for more prisoners Gerel and Talyor stop at a cell that has a prisioner neither of them expected to see here. Lying in the cell, unconscious is a tall muscular man with white/silver hair and a red trench coat.
"Dante!?" Gerel exclaimed with worry, cutting the cell door open and rushing in. Gently shaking him he shouted "Dante? Dante! Wake up already!"
Groaning this Dante guy slowly opened his eyes and wearily said,"Hey Gerel. Long time no see."
"Tch! Good to see your feeling better." Gerel mutters to himself,"What happened? How did you even get to this world?"
"Well, while Trish and Lady went out for some girl time I got another call. When I got to the location in question there was a blinding light then I was unconscious."

The male Taylor interrupts,"Wait a second! How is it that you know Dante?"
"Yeah. Last I recall his a game character too." Added the female Taylor.
Gerel facepalms himself and says,"That's right I never told you guys. I, more or less, come from the same world as the Taylors. Only when I left it was by complete accident, luckily enough some twist about it all allowed me to at least learn common powers and, in time, develop my own as well. That's why I'm so banged up. The last world I was in I was doing a lot of fighting. I don't have much control over when and where I leave though so, appearing here was complete chance."

"I guess that makes some sense", Sierra says to herself.
"Don't worry. I'm still trying to understand it myself. So, Taylors, Sierra, do you know where prisioners gear might be held at here?"
"Well, I don't remember one in the game, but if I had to choose I think Wilfre would put them in the top floor somewhere so it's harder to get to. That and if the castle was destroyed then their things would be lost in the rubble." Theorized the female Taylor.
"Alright! Than just in case we have to fight more..."Gerel extends his arms outward as suddenly portals appear where his hands disappeared and pulled from them two black pistols with a blue to white bolt design on them. He hands the guns to Dante saying,"I know they aren't Ebony&Ivory but I think these are still your style. And this too." Then Gerel sticks his arms together outwards and pulls out a Crimsion red sword with runes on the blade and light black with red outlines to the handguard and hilt.

Everyone is shocked or surprised and Sierra asks,"What did you just do?"
"Well, in my quest to return home or to other previously visited worlds my studies of space, time, portals, and other variables helped me include some of it in my powers. Like making a pocket dimension to store things. And in serious circumstances, a prison or battlefield to keep the target in and everything else out. Because of things like a pocket dimension I also try to; One, collect extra of everything and; Two, try to duplicate more unique things if possible." Gerel explains.
Male Taylor claps his hands once,"Well! Now that that's out of the way, what do you guys say to us finding the room prisoners belongings should be in?" Everyone nods and mutters in agreement and proceed to make their way up the castle.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: They find something interesting

choices: Taylor and simply took over his body.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
"No no no no no no!" Wiflre shouted as he jumped on his throne. "This is my world! I'm supposed to win! I'm..."

"How about you fight your own battles for once?!" I shouted.

"Grrrr....Fine! One last round...me and my pet against Shadow and Spectra. Let's see just who wins this one!"

I wanted to see this battle. Shadow and Spectra had gelatious bodies, meaning that they could change their shapes. Shadow could hide in anyone's shadow and take it over if it has a weak will. Spectra could shape his body into anything, like a sword or shield or something. The entire room cleared up, and the battlers took the stage. Scorpion threw his claws towards Shadow, but Shadow used his powers and hid in Scorpion's shadow. Wicker charged some lightning within his cloud and aimed it at Spectra. Spectra put out his hand and a small mirror formed. The lightning reflected off of the mirror and hit Wilfre. Wilfre looked even angrier when he recovered. Wilfre swooped down but Spectra jumped by turning his feet into a spring. He then changed into an anvil and slammed straight through the cloud. A large splat was heard, and black ink flowed underneath Spectra. Spectra got up and saw Wilfre. His scepter laid on the ground a few feet beside him. He slowly inched his way over there, but I walked over and picked it up. It grew to my size and I kept it. Wilfre's scorpion soon laud beside him with a large cut in it's head. Shadow had his sword out, but put it away when he returned to us. The cage around our friends disappeared, and we all met back together.

"Congradulations Master" said Slice n Splice.

"Wilfre won't be a threat anymore!" said Sierra.

"Not so...uh....fast..." said Wilfre. I walked over and stated right at the little puddle. I could see his eyes, but no mouth. "I still...can fight...uh...you all..."

"What are you going to do? Drip on us?" asked Taylor.

"No...this...!"

With a last bit of might, Wilfre jumped up and attached to...
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Wilfre and his Pet versus Shadow and Spectra

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I watched in horror as Wilfre soaked into his pet scorpion's wounds. It was creepy, cool, but kind of creepy. The beast roared in absolute pain as breaking bones were heard. The creature grew, grew greater than what he was before. Its claws became misshapen but menacing, its stinger growing large. Four white eyes formed onto the now black armor. I backed away in horrid fear, others doing the same. "I-I don't this received a Rated E for Everyone!" I tried to joke.

"Games have changed..." he spoke in what was a deeper voice. "In fact...its time to really show my power!"

The scepter that was in my hands glowed a hot white, I had to let go. The scepter released seven different streams of what looked like steam. However when they settled, they were small ghostly incantations of the other bosses. They all looked surprised that they were there. But then, their faces took upon a look of fear. They were soon all sucked into Wifre's body. He roared in pain as his body went through more changes. Objects began to stick out of his body, parts growing and becoming misshapen; everything was horrid. "Everyone get out!" Luckily it didn't decide to take them long at all. However, the door was soon smashed by a giant black tendril; leaving me, Sierra, and all eight of my creations behind a wall of rubble.

I turned to see the source of the tendril, and I regretted my decision. The black mass looked like a horrid mix of all of the bosses. I think I overheard Sierra puking. However, soon the mass ceased and reshaped. Four giant robotic legs formed from its base as it rose. Black shadow still swirled around the legs like wiring. A long tail snaked out, but he end of the tail looked like Frostwind! Only this version seemed to be black scaled and more menacing. As its body grew, dark wooden armor began to grow around it. Two arms stretched out, ending with black and evil versions of Angler King. Its shoulders gained laser cannons, similar to those found on the King and Queen ships. Its back sprouted two large branches, ending with a large collection of leaves. A ghostly aura formed around the monster as its head formed. It resembled the scorpion, but Wilfre's four eyes appeared in it. He roared, "I AM THE ULTIMATE CREATION!" His eyes glanced down at my creations as they charged. He chuckled loudly, "You heroes are INSECTS to me!" His large leg smashed the ground, throwing most off. His Blackfrost tail exhaled black ice, which froze Spectra and Shadow. The laser cannons made quick work of Bot's ship. The other heroes were soon defeated. It was then that the beast looked to me, "WHAT CAN YOU POSSIBLY DO NOW?!"

I turn and bolted, hoping to escape. However soon a giant tendril grabbed me. I tried to fight as much as I could, but the tendril had me good. I was soon face to face with the beast, "Surrender...and become my new slave, or I shall DESTROY YOU'RE FRIENDS!" I looked to my creations, and then to the angel Sierra. She looked fearful, but I was not sure of what reason; the monster or my deal.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: This was never part of the game!

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I sneered at him, an idea clicking. If everything that has happened today truly happened, then what was going to happen next would not fail. "You may be the ultimate creation, but I am the Creator!" I put my hand towards the ground. The scepter flung into my hand. The beast looked completely surprised. I focused my energy, and soon all of my heroes healed and floated before him. "You're not the only one with an imagination!"

I swirled the magic scepter, my heroes lost their forms and soon joined together in one mass. I had to think long and hard to what went where. Soon, my creation began to take form. First thing formed was the body, which was Stumpy's body. But instead of a blob, it was a symmetrical armor-like body with a more detailed spiral in the center. Next, the legs. A sturdy wooden leg with vines growing in and out of it formed to his right, while a bulky mechanical leg formed to its left. The arms soon came, a multicolored right arm formed while a aquatic scaled hand formed. His shoulders were placed with two large subwoofers, a few other instruments forming on his back. However those were not the only things on his back. Two large bat wings, each with a sinister eye on the webbing, formed. Then, his head. The head appeared like Bot's, but of course, way more incredible. The beast looked startled. I jumped out of the tendril and landed on his shoulder. "Say hello to the Creation Knight!"

The right arm formed into a rainbow sword before clashing with the beast's armor. The UC (Ultimate Creation) roared before charging. The two clashed, each trying to overpower each other. The branches of the UC shook, releasing hoards of Shadow Bats. However the Creation Knight fought back, using his speakers to blast the bats away. Blackfrost breathed his horrid ice, however the wooden leg caused vines to grow up and block it. "ENOUGH!" Both me and my creation was tossed back. When I looked up, I looked in horror. All parts of the beast's body was glowing, preparing a final attack. I do not think he could stand it. Before the beam fired, I was soon covered up. The blast was heard, but it was never felt. I was soon released, and found that we were behind the creature. UC turned and roared in anger, "HOW DID YOU SURVIVE THAT?!"

I couldn't let him know the truth, so I winged it. "The power of imagination will always prevail for good, not evil. Next time Wilfre...come up with something original!" I focused my scepter, the hero merged into it. Then, with one fell swing, a giant beam of multicolored energy flew out. The beast roared in pain as it exploded. Energy surges destroyed the castle like it was made from building blocks. Light poured from all over. I was blinded by the massive amount of energy. When my vision cleared, I was...
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Creation versus Creation

1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.content:
I saw white, nothing but white. Everywhere I looked, white white white. I was scared, "Am I...dead?"

Then, a small red light shone in the distance. I "walked" towards the red light. I instantly saw the scepter. I reached out to touch it, but it only glowed white hot. Soon, several beams of color flowed out of the weapon. I soon found myself surrounded by all of the bosses. I freaked out, especially when I saw my heroes with them. "W-What is going on?!"

"A blessing" Frostwind spoke.

"A blessing?"

"You freed us from being a eternal slave of that dreaded being Wilfre" Bakibeard spoke.

"And now, our services are to you" Deadwood spoke. "Whenever you may need us, simply use the scepter on a object that relates to our nature. Then, we may help you however you like."

I bowed, but looked back, "But what of my heroes...?"

"We are like the same" Stumpy spoke. "Simply use the scepter to call us."

I nodded and bowed as they soon disappeared. I heard something, and soon my vision cleared to see.
1151121111121112111111112112111111111112.title: Blessing

115112111112111211111111211211111111112.content:
"Wat!" Sierra interrupted.
We all stared at her curiously.
"I have a few pokemon of my own. Most from Kanto and a few from Jhoto," she added. She closed her eyes and a belt of six pokeballs appeared around her waist. She opened her eyes and grabbed one.
"This is Flame," she said happily tossing it in the air. The ball opened and an orange dragon like creature appeared. "She's my Charizard." Sieera explained happily. She tossed three more in the air. A yellow and black bird appeared first. Then, a blue elegant bird with a sparkling tail appeared. Finally, an orange and red bird with flaming wings appeared. "These are my legendary birds, Zapados, Arcticuno, and Molteres." She threw out two more. A little white angel-like creature with color ful shapes flew about and an elephant creature that looked somewhat like a tire rolled about. "And finally Evan and Donphan. Evan is a Togetic," she finished, hugging the Charizard.
"Well, we have enough to fly over the building with..." Olivia murmured.
"No, I was planning on using them to attack the enemies once we dug our way inside. My Articuno is level 72, Zapdos is level 70, Molres is level 56, Flame is level 71, Evan is level 20, and Donphan is level 30. Very powerful pokemon. Beat the elite four twice. Well, except Evan and Donphan, but still," Sierra explained.
I nodded at her. Impressive.
115112111112111211111111211211111111112.title: Wait

115112111112111211111111211211112.content:
I pondered a bit and made my decision.
"No, King Broom. They shouldn't fight eachother. It wouldn't be right," I answered.
"Okay, Mr. Taylor. Just call when you need us," he said. Then he hung up.
"Good luck, Taylor! See ya soon!" Sierra cheered on the intercom.
As we drove around, we spotted the creatures. Popon spotted us first. He seemed happy to see us.
"Popon, what are you doing?" I yelled at him.
He said something I couldn't understand. Slice n' Splice nodded and looked at me.
"He says he want's to destroy penguin man," S n' S translated.
"I think he would eat you before you could do that!" I replied.
Belly Buster spun around and made a pie. He handed it to me and stared at me worridly. He made a sound.
"He's hoping a bride would win your approval," S n' S explained.
"No, he's with us and helping us. Even though he is a dope, I cannot accept a bribe, although I will eat it," I said defianlly.
Cobgoblin looked mad and uttered words.
"He says you cannot take a bribe and not allow them to do it. He wants to fight in order to win your approval," S n' S said.
I looked at Kirby, Mario, and Slice n' Splice. Then at the angry monsters.
This would be a good chance to test out my powers, but which one?
115112111112111211111111211211112.title: No

11512.content:
You shrug the girl off and open your door. There's a robot inside.
"CHOSEN ONE MUST DIE" it says.
Hit fires a lazer at you and you die instantly.
11512.title: Drive home

1152.content:
"Video-games is no excuse for these grades, young lady!" Your mom yells at you.
"Neither are those silly comics you read, either!" Your dad growls, "In fact, no video-games, comics, Internet, phone-"
"But dad!" You yell as your eyes swell with tears.
"Friends, band, choir, girl scouts, or T.V. until you raise your grades. No buts. Now go to your room!" He demands with a roar.
"God, I hate you! You're ruining my life!" You scream running up to your room. You bury your face in your pillow and begin to cry. You lift your face and look at your poster. The characters smile at you.
'If I was one of those guys, I could live a life of adventure. A life without stupid parents telling me what to do. That's the life I want..." You think to yourself. You close your eyes and fall asleep. In your dream a girl with angel wings appears and talks to you.
"I've heard you talking to your parents. I've also heard you want to live like a video game character... And we need your help! Please, will you help us?!" She cries.
What do you do?
1152.title: Girl

choices: A Kirby character of your choice
A Mario character of your choice
11521.content:
The anger in you boils so much that you want nothing to do with your parents. You reach out to the girl's hand and grab it you shake hands in agreement.
"Okay! Good to hear that! I wish you good luck and we will meet again soon! Farewell!"
You go through what looks like a jell-o tunnel and land in pitch black darkness. You hear a voice.
"Hey? Are you okay? That was some fall you took! Hello?"
You rub your eyes and see a bright blue sky. There are pink flying balls with faces flying about. You look up and see a very famous video game character standing before you, extending a hand to lift you up.

Who is it?
11521.title: Agree and go with her

115211.content:
As you open your eyes, you see that you are in the middle of a forest. You get up and feel a peircing pain in your anckle.
'I must of sprained it on my way down!' You think as you reach down and rub it. You look around some more and see a giant tree with a face! It looked pretty angry! It inhaled and started blowing air at you! You flew backwards and rammed into someone!
"Ooof!" You grunt as you make impact. "Oh, dear god! I'm so sorry..."
115211.title: A Dream Come True

choices: Bowser Jr. 9Not very nice, but he may like YOU!)
115212.content:
A hand grabs your's before you see their face. They pull you to your feet, were you stand, with elly-legs. You look up and gasp, relizing who it is.



Who is it, then?!
115212.title: A Mario character of your choice

11522.content:
You wake up. You sigh to yourself. All of a sudden. Your door is busted down by to robots.
"CHOSEN ONE. YOU ARE SENTENCED TO DEATH. PREPARE TO DIE" they say.
They fire a lazer at you and you die instantly.



THE END
11522.title: Refuse and stay home

12.content: You can pick from an actual villain, or you can pick a minnion. Minnions are always fun...
12.title: Bad Guys

121.content: What's Bowser up to this time?
121.title: King of the Koopas.

choices: A strange man beckoning to him.
122.content:
As Ganondorf stood in his new dark palace, he found it all fashioned to his tastes. He had finished conquering a whole new realm, one that provided a lot of resources for his new dark army. He paused for a moment, reflecting on his victory over Princess Zelda. She stood no chance against his awesome power, and now he had two pieces of the Triforce. He knew, however, that his triumph would be short-lived if he didn't do something about Link. As long as he possessed the Triforce of Courage, he stood a chance against him.

Presently, Ganondorf stepped out and found...
122.title: Ganondorf

124.content: Oh, God, not another one! *sigh* alright, well, which game are you from?
124.title: A minion

1241.content: Simple, simple. Mario has some good minions. Which one are you? I can never remember their names...
1241.title: Super Mario

12411.content: Finally, are you male or female?
12411.title: Bom-Omb

choices: I woke up in the middle of Toad Town
I woke up in the middle of the night in a strange place... (readers choice)
124111.content:
"Alright, ya lay abouts! Wake up!"
This is about the third time those Koopa Bro.s have cut into my sleeping time. They're gonna make me blow my fuse if I don't get a full nights rest. But, I shouldn't get mad or I'll end up like that Bombette chick. She blew up right next to Black Koopa and got put in a cage. Poor girl.
We all got up (Well, technically we were already up, since we can't lay down) and walked single file down the hall to the outside of the fortress. There, standing right in front of us, was King Bowser! He looked as horrifying as everyone had said, and more! He had red fur and eyebrows. His shell was green and covered and spikes. His wrists and ankles had spiked braclets on them, along with his neck. His teeth were overbite and sharp. He was yellow and had two large horns on his head. Standing next to him on his left was Bowser Jr. On his right was nonother than the sorceress, Kammy Koopa.
Bowser Jr. kinda looked the same, only his fur was in a pony tail. He held a paint brush and wore a bib with a monster's mouth on it. His braclets had no spikes on them, and the only place with braclets was his wrists.
Kammy wore a purple robe and witches hat. She also wore glasses and rode on a broom with purple on the end. She held a golden staff with a red jewel on the top.
"Alright! We're in buisseness with the top guys now everyone!" Bowser yelled.
Everyone was quiet.
"Which means you get more work!" Kammy joined.
"Yes, so-" Bowser started. Before he could finish, one of the Bom-ombs set of and ran at Bowser. He bumped into him and Bowser picked him up. He turned the poor thing around and faced it towards himself and squished it in his mighty claws. It fell from his clutches and landed on the ground and clattered like a piece of metal. Everyone gasped, even the Koopa Bro.s. That was pretty heartless. Even for a bad guy.
"So, I see you all like my new strength," Bowser said sinisterly. "Why don't I demonstrate for you, just how much more powerful I am," he snarled. He walked by and stopped at a near by Bullet Bill launcher. He wacked it and out popped a Bullet Bill. He grabbed it and squeezed it. It popped due to all the pressure and Bowser flung it at the machine. It blew up. In all of this, I got somewhat interested in the destruction, so I walked out of line to get a better view. Kammy looked at me and shouted.
"Bowser, looks like we have a wanderer!" she shouted.
I quickly looked over to see her pointing at me. I ran into line and knocked over a few Bom-ombs and Koopas. Bowser marched up to me and glared at me with a sinister grin. He grabbed me and breathed on me.
"I'm feeling generous right now," he whispered. "But you are releaved of duty,"
He wound up his arm and flung me. Flew across the sky for sevral hours. It felt nice at first. Feeling the wind in your whick. A Bom-omb could get used to this... But It got boring. The sky started out bright and blue, but eventually it grew darker and darker. I eventually landed on the hard ground and was knocked out cold.
124111.title: Strange Orders

1241111.content:
I woke up in an odd way. I was on my back! I tried to turn over, but I was utterly stuck. I heaved and wobbled and kicked around, but it was no use. I looked around and saw that there was a huge crater around me.
'How did this happen?' I thought to myself. The memories flooded back to me after a while of thinking.
'Bowser...' I thought bitterly. I looked up and saw the changing of the sky from black, to violet, to pink and orange, and then the starting of blue. It was very pleasing to see the sky change colours again. It was even beautiful I guess, since I had been in that fortress for years, working nonstop, except to eat and sleep. However, my view got interupted by a pesky mushroom. Wait... Two? No, five! Twenty?! These aren't mushrooms! They're toads! I'm in Toad Town! I started frantically kicking and wobbling, trying to get out of there, but it was no use. I was in there deep. Three toads slid down into my crater and looked at me. They giggled and looked at eachother, then back at me.
"This is our new favorite game!" One of them said. They started kicking me!
"Stop it! Knock it off! Don't think that just because you're kids I won't bomb you!" I yelled.
"This is awesome!" Another yelled.
PLINK.
I fell on top of my head and rolled onto my face. I pushed all my wait to my back and pushed up onto my feet. I lit my whick and chased after those brats. Or, I would've if something hadn't stopped me. I took a few steps to start off, but after four steps, there was an awful screeching sound. It was so loud, it echoed throughout the town and everyone covered their ears, even those dasterdly little rats. I couldn't, cause I don't have arms or hands, but I could hear ringing in my head! It was awful! I started to run again, but that screeching sound came again, only this time my back felt like it was getting pierced by knifes! I looked behind me and saw something that any Bom-omb would see as a death sentence.
My wind key was broken! Part of it was missing and what was still there was bent and shaped almost like a hook. My black paint had been scrapped off where the key had scrapped me and where Bowser had handled me. I felt like I was gonna throw up, if I had a mouth. (We Bom-omb's eat gun powder. You just unscrew us from the whick and pour it in) I collapsed on my side and started bawling. I wasn't sure if it was from the pain, or from the fact that my life was over. I could tell that the toads were focused on how to deal with a bom-omb ruining their town, but something grabbed me and carried me away. My eyes were so swelled with tears that I couldn't see who it was, but they told me to calm down and rest. After resting awhile, I opened my my eyes to see-
1241111.title: Broken

choices: please apologize to the kids before you leave!"
12411112.content:
A guy who was wearing way too much green. He was tall and had a big black mustache. He wore overals with a green shirt underneath and a green hat with an L on it. He was standing really close to my face. A little too close than I'm comfortable with.
"Hey, could you back off a little bit?" I growled.
"Sorry! I was just wanting a better look at you," he quickly said.
"Guy, its fine. Just, not so close," I stated.
"I'm Luigi," he said.
"I'm..." My voice trailed off. I don't think I have a name. "Uh..."
"What's your name?" Luigi asked awkwardly.
"Well... I..." I started thinking of names to use that would suit me. I kinda know why parents have such a hard time naming their children.
"My name is Boomer," I replied awkwardly. It was the only thing I could think of, other than Bomber. But that one sounded kinda plain.
"Nice to meet you, Boomer! You should forgive those toad children. They're always fooling around with things," hesaid happily.
"Forgive them?! I just flew through the sky for like, eight-teen billion hours, got stuck in the ground, and then they broke my twist up key! And you expect me to forgive them?!" I screamed.
"Sorry!" He cried. This guy is very scared of things. I better not scare him too bad... Wait... Am I... Caring for others?! What?! Aww... But he's so nice looking... DANG IT!
"Hey, Luigi, its okay. I didn't me to snap at you. I'm just stressed out is all,"
"Okay. While you were resting, I managed to unbend some of your key. But part of it is still stuck. It sorta imbedded itself into you. But it shouldn't hurt too bad. I put a piece of rubber on the sharp parts," he explained.
"Uh... Thank you Luigi... Nobody I know would ever do that for me. The Koopa Bro.s would have just left me to continue working and done nothing..." I murmured.
"You're welcome!" He replied happily. "You're a friend. I couldn't just leave you behind!"
'Friend?' I thought to myself.
"Well, thank you. I have something I need to do,"
"What?! You're leaving already?!" Luigi exclaimed.
"It can't wait. Bowser needs to learn a lesson," I growled.
"Bowser?! That's who did this to you?!"
"Yea. He needs to learn a lesson on messing with me,"
"Now how are you going to do that?"
"I'm gonna go find him,"
"But-"
I walked out the door and walked up to a pipe. Luigi grabbed my whick and turned me around.
"If you're going on an adventure, then-"
12411112.title: The Start Of My First Friendship

124111121.content:
'Come with me? Why would he want to do that?' I thought to myself.
"Pretty please? My brother, Mario, always goes on adventures and I never get to join him," he pleaded.
"Mario's your brother?! I was supposed to destroy him if he came to the Koopa Bro.s Fortress!" I exclaimed. How was I supposed to deal with this?! My enemy's brother wants to come on an adventure with me?
"Uh.." I stammered.
"I understand. You don't want me to tag along either..." He sighed.
"Wait! Luigi! How about you just come along to help me around for a while," I said quickly. "After all, you did help me out,"
"Really?! You mean it?!" He exclaimed.
"Sure..." I sighed.
"Thanks! I'll be the best partner ever!" He exclaimed.
"Alright, so let's go!" I said. We jumped into a pipe and went in. When we came out, we were at Toad Town. I got a little nervous, since those kids could be anywhere. Any who knows what kind of trouble I'm in for wrecking the center of town. Luigi just kept pushing me along until we made it to a sign the had the towns name on it. Before we left, a man garbed entirley in blue came running towards us.
"Luigi! Luigi!" He shouted.
"What, Merlon?" Luigi responded in shock.
"I have for seen something in my crystal eye!" The guy named Merlon gasped.
"What?"
"Something starnge is going on with the cosmos. The stars tell me that the universes are colliding and quarelling. They told me to tell you! For you have something they want!" Merlon huffed.
"What?! What's wrong with the universes?!" I yelled horrifyingly. This was scary! I thought there was only one universe, the one I lived in. That's it. Nobody else. Just the little Mushroom Kingdom.
"You!" Merlon gasped as he pointed at me. "They wanted you!"
"Me?!" I choked.
"Yes! The bomb with a broken key! You're him!" Merlon said.
"What about me?"
"You're supposed to travel to the other universes and help restore order!" Merlon explained.
"No way! I'm just a cute little bom-omb! See?" I said shakily. I started walking around, but the key scrapped my back again. "Owwwww!" I screamed.
"Do not lie! You have a goal! And the only way to accomplish it, is to help restore order!" Merlon said.
"Okay! Fine! I'll do it!" I cried. This guy is wacko. But, it would explain Bowser's strength without having the Star Rod...
"That's all I have to say. Good bye," Merlon said as he left.
"Wow..." Luigi sighed. "That was weird..."
"Yea... Let's go..." I suggested as we left Toad Town. We walked down a path until something caught my eye.
"Hey, Luigi, do you see that?"
"What? Oh that..." He replied.
It looked kinda like a flat Blooper, smash from the top of his head, with really skiny and small tentacles. It was purple and black with white specks.
"Bosst me up there, would ya?" I asked. Luigi picked me up and set me on the ground up there. The shape was sucking things in like a weak vaccum. Leaves and dirt were getting sucked in to it. It looked pretty cool. I kicked a rock into it and it never came back so I got a decent sized tree branch and kicked it in. Same results.
"What do you think it is?" Luigi asked.
"I don't know..." I replied. It started getting a little smaller.
"Hey! Its shrinking!" Luigi exclaimed.
"Let's go in it!" I suggested excitedly.
"Nuh, uh! No way am I going in there!" Luigi stated. He stepped back.
"Then I guess I'll see ya later!" I said, as I jumped in. It was cold. And dry. It was very windy as well. I opened my eyes and saw things zooming all around me. Everything was moving. Even me. It was creepy. But finally, I swirled around and landed on my old friend, the ground. This time, I landed head first, so everything was upsidedown. I looked around and saw something really, really scary. WATER!
"Ack! Help!" I shouted. No one responded. "Hello?! Help?!
This time, someone did respond. A bush rustled and the character was-
124111121.title: Portals To Somewhere

choices: Meta Knight, Sword Knight, and Blade Knight,"
1241111212.content:
It was very odd. It was unlike anything I had ever seen. It was shaped like a sphere and had a peach coloured face. The outside of his face was red and his feet were orange. His hands were stubs and his feet were kinda like shoes. He stumbled through the bushes, swatting franticly around himself.
"Curse these pesky bugs!" He yelled.
"Hey, hello, over here!" I shouted. I noticed as he walked up to me, he had no mouth! Just like me!
"Holy cheese muffins! A talking bomb! Now I've seen it all," he yelped as he swatted his cheek.
"Could you get me outta here?" I asked as I kicked around.
"Sure," he murmured. He grabbed my feet and pulled me over. I shook myself off and looked at him. I've never seen anything like him before...
"Thank you. Uh... Who are you?" I asked.
"My name is Sailor Dee," he said respectfuly as he saluted me.
"Uh... I'm Boomer," I replied.
"What are you?" Sailor Dee asked as he swatted his foot.
"I'm a Bom-omb from the Mushroom Kingdom. Duh! How do you not know what I am?" I asked.
"Mushroom Kingdom?" He said with a confused look.
"You know, with Princess Peach and Toads," I explained.
"Uh... No... I'm from Cappy Town," he said.
"Don't you mean Toad Town?" I asked.
"No, Cappy Town. King Dedede's castle to be exact," he explained.
"King Dedede? Now I've seen it all..." I sighed.
"Yes! His majesty has just sent me on an important quest to find a new job," he chirped sarcastically.
"So has my king..." I sighed.
"What?! Small world! What's his name?" Sailor Dee asked.
"King Bowser," I replied.
"Wow... So do Bom-ombs usually look like this?" He asked as he pulled on my key.
"Owww! Leave that alone! No! Only I do..." I yelped.
"Sorry... Its just so weird looking..." He said.
"Its fine. So, where am I?" I asked as I looked around.
"You're in Dreamland!" He exclaimed.
"WHAT?! But I was just in the Mushroom Kingdom!" I yelled.
"Where, er, how did you get here?" He asked.
"From..." I looked around."There!" I shouted as I looked towards the sky at a black hole the size of an apple.
"From that thing?" He asked as he shaded his eyes.
"Yea. But I guess I'm stuck here..." I sighed.
"Wait... Do you hear that?" He said.
"Hear what?" I asked. He grabbed my key and pulled me into some bushes.
"Owwww!" I hissed.
"Shhhhhhhh," he hushed.
We looked through the bushes and saw a group of people. They seemed to be looking for something.
"Who are those guys?" I asked in a whisper.
"They're-
1241111212.title: Sailor Dee

12411112122.content:
"Kirby, how many times are you going to eat that jump rope and run!" Shouted a small girl. Her hair was blonde and up in an orange ponytail. She was clothed in a pink top and green bottom with orange shoes.
"Yea, Kirby! C'mon! Give it back!" Shouted a smaller boy. He had blonde hair with green add the edges. His hair covered his eyes. He wore blue overalls and had orange shoes as well.
"Poyo poyo!" Shouted a pink ball with red feet. He had blue eyes and a cheerful smile with dark pink dimples.
"The girl is Tiff, the boy is Tuff, and the pink blob is Kirby," whispered Sailor Dee.
Kirby ran around and stopped. He walked up to our bush, and looked at us. Sailor Dee fainted, so it was just me and Kirby.
"What'd ya find Kirby?" Asked Tuff.
"Poyo..." Murmured Kirby. Kirby got a devious grin and took a fighting stance.
"What are you do-" I started, but he opened his mouth and started inhaling like a vacuum! I stood my ground, but was no match against the pressure and flew inside. Kirby gulped and I flew out inside a star and landed with a thud. Kirby jumped in the air and a blue hat appeared on his head and a bomb in his hands. He landed and continued looking at me.
"You wanna fight?!" I challenged.
He nodded.
"Then bring it!" I shouted as I lit my whick.
12411112122.title: Boomer is a Snack

124111121222.content:
I charged at Kirby and he grabbed a bomb (that uh, came out of thin air) and threw it at me, but suddenly, there was a flash of light and I was sent flying into a tree. I looked over and saw that Kirby lay on the ground across from me, a little dazed. But next to him was the scariest thing I'd ever seen. It had a silver face and yellow eyes, purple feet, an indigo body, and a navy blue cape. It clutched a golden sword in its fists.
"Meta Knight!" I heard Sailor Dee cry.
"Sailor Dee... What is this creature?" Asked Meta Knight in a mexican accent.
"Its Boomer!" Sailor Dee chirped happily.
"What is a 'Boomer'? Some type of... Bomb?" Meta Knight said as he examined me.
"Hey! I'm a bomb-omb from the Mushroom Kingdom!" I shouted as I stepped back next to Sailor Dee.
"A 'Bomb-Omb'?" Meta Knight repeated, his eyes turning green.
"Mushroom Kingdom?" Tuff asked curiously.
"That's right... I'm not from here... You wouldn't know about it..." I sighed. 'Man... This place is just full of idiots...' I thought to myself.
"Tell me about this 'Mushroom Kingdom', Boomer," Meta Knight said.
"Well... Its ruled by a pretty princess named Princess Toadstool, but she prefers to be Princess Peach. She has servants called 'Toads' that serve her, and also live in Toad Town. But, my old boss, King Koopa, also known as King Bowser, uses his minions to kidnap the princess. I, uh, sorta did something wrong and got fired from my job..." I explained.
"What happened to the Princess?" Tiff asked.
"Oh! There are these plumbers called 'The Mario Brothers' that go on adventures to save her from Bowser's clutches. I was 'lucky' enough to meet one," I added blankly.
"Boomer... What happened here?" Meta Knight asked as he fingered my key.
"Ow! Please, don't touch it!" I whined. "King Bowser broke it!"
"He broke it? What's it for?"
"I don't know... I think its there to help me walk or something... But now that its broken, I can't run," I explained saddly.
"That's terrible!" Tiff cried angrily.
"So that's why I'm on a mission to destroy Bowser!" I growled.
"Revenge is no way to act," Meta Knight said wisely.
"Yeah, keep telling yourself that, fluffy, I have a King to kill," I said. "C'mon Sailor Dee, let's go," I instructed as I walked off.
"Bye' guys!" Sailor Dee chirped.
124111121222.title: Interuption

1241111212221.content:
Sailor Dee and I made our way through the forest. We talked very little, though it was because we had very little to talk about. I didn't know where I was going, or how I was going to get back to the Mushroom Kingdom, but I was only focused on moving forward. I hope Luigi is alright by himself... I thought somberly to myself.

"Hey, uh, Boomer. Not that this isn't fun, but... Where exactly are we going? I haven't been this far from the castle before," Sailor Dee asked, glancing around wearily.

"I'm not too sure, to be honest. I guess we just keep going until we find one of those portal things," I replied, not turning back to face him. Ahead, I could hear the crashing of waves, and where the grass became sand.

"This is Onion Ocean. I've never seen it this close before," Sailor Dee exclaimed, running ahead. "Boomer, let's look around here! There's supposed to be a kingdom somewhere... Perhaps the prince will know how to get you back home!"

         I stared at him wide-eyed. Maybe he's right. Let's stop and look around. It wouldn't be a bad idea to look for that kingdom...
1241111212221.title: The Adventure Begins
