12422222222222222.title: Denjaa

124222222222222221.content: Male or Female?(imagine a female version on Denjaa!)
124222222222222221.title: Gender

1242222222222222211.content:
I was surrounded by darkness while walking down this hall. I was told to come here, but I didnt know why. I came upon a room, with a large machine in the middle. Behind it was a screen, that flashed on. A man dressed in a uniform that had brown hair and wore glasses appeared.

"Glad for you to come Denjaa" he said with a smile.

"You ordered me sir?" I asked.

"I need you to destroy this little pest."

A picture of a little pink ball with a face appeared.

"What's so bad about this thing?" I asked.

"This...is Kirby" he replied.

I knew exactly what he wanted. A few years ago, NME tried to destroy Kirby with a Denjaa before me. But Kirby destroyed that one.

"We want you to destroy Kirby properly than the one before."

"But how am I supposed to do that when one failed before? Kirby will recognize me and attack."

"That's the beauty if our plan. This one is a little different. First, we removed the memory of a Denjaa ever being there from every resident of Dream Land."

The Monster Delivery System ray aimed at me.

"And second, we won't be giving you to King Dedede."

"Then who are you giving me to?"

"We're just going to send you to Dream Land. I'm not sure where you'll land, but the mission is what you need to focus on. Good luck!"

Before I could say anything, the ray fired and I was sent. I felt so weird going through the delivery system, and colors zoomed by me. When everything cleared, I was...
1242222222222222211.title: The Mission

12422222222222222112.content:
I saw a big blue lake below me. I just fell and fell, and I had no way to change my direction. I landed face first into the water, and began to flail my arms.

"Help!" I yelled. "I can't swim!"

If I go under, all of the water will get inside my body! Well, I guess that's what I get for not having a mouth. Wait! What am I making jokes for?! I going to die!

I felt being pulled in like a vacuum was doing it. I reached shore, and I climbed on. I laid down exhausted. I looked up, and saw Kirby. There were other people around him, but my attention was on him. He had a smile on his face.
12422222222222222112.title: Just my luck!

124222222222222221122.content:
I know that man told me to attack, but Kirby just saved me. Is he truly the enemy?

Two other people walked up. One was a boy and one was a girl. The boy had green and orange hair, orange skin, and wore blue pants. The girl had long blonde hair, yellow skin, and wore a pink and red dress.

"Great job Kirby!" said the boy. "You saved him!"

"Yeah but, who is he?" asked the girl. I've never seen anything like him before."

So they don't know who I am. That's a relief.

"What's your name?" asked the boy.

"My name is Denjaa" I replied.

"Nice to meet ya. My name's Tuff, and this is my sister Tiff. And that's Kirby."

Kirby jumped and cheered.

"It's nice to meet you all."

"So how did you end up in a lake?" asked Tiff.

I needed to think of a lie, "I don't really know. I was walking down the path, and something zoomed by and knocked me in."

"I didn't see anything" said Tiff. She was giving me an evil glare.

"Come on sis, lighten up!" said Tuff. "Hey Denjaa, want a tour of Cappy Town?"

I was surprised by his offer. Before I said anything, Kirby grabbed my hand and pulled me towards a town. Tuff and Tiff followed us. He headed towards..,
124222222222222221122.title: Friend or Foe?

1242222222222222211222.content:
Kirby dragged me towards a town. Several creatures were busy in the streets, but Kirby pulled me into one building. It's doors were covered with red drapes and had three blue flags over top. Inside were many tables. Kirby happily jumped up and sat in one of the chairs. I sat next to him, and Tiff and Tuff hurried in. They were panting hard. Once they caught their breath, they looked annoyed.

"Kirby! You took him here first?!" exclaimed Tiff.

"Do want to make a friend or make him sick?!" exclaimed Tuff.

Sick!?!

"Who's here?" asked a voice.

Through some doors, a orange creature wearing chef attire walked in. He was carrying a tray full of dumplings.

"Oh, well hello Kirby" he said. "And who might this be?"

"Hi Chef Kawasaki" said Tiff. "This is Denjaa. He's new here and we were giving him the grand tour."

"Well have a snack!"

He set down the tray of dumplings, and Kirby reached for it. Tiff and Tuff held him back.

"Kirby, let him try some first!" exclaimed Tiff.

"You might want to eat some before Kirby gets to them" said Tuff.

I stopped on that. I can eat, it just wasn't like them. A grabbed a dimpling and threw it above my head. The dumpling went down, and I saw everyone stare at me.

"S-Sorry" I said. I hope they don't recognize me!

"It's okay" said Tiff. "Everyone is different."

"So how is it?" asked Kawasaki.

I tasted the dumpling, and it wasn't that bad. Better than what I usually get.

"I like it" I said.

"Finally!" he replied. "Someone other than Kirby that actually likes my food!"

I turned to the others, who looked like they knew.

"Not everyone likes Kawasaki's food" replied Tuff. "But Kirby loves it!"

I saw Kirby inhale the rest of the dumplings in a matter of seconds. I said my thanks and I toured the rest of the town. The town had nearly everything; a hospital, a library, a gas station, even a fossil place! I learned that the creatures were called Cappys, and everyone greeted me kindly. No one seemed to recognize me at all. Kirby seemed excited to show me the next place.
1242222222222222211222.title: The Tour Beginning

12422222222222222112222.content:
I was walking with Kirby when some weird machine pulled up in front of us. A blue penguin in a red robe and a gray snail were in the seats.

"Well well" said the penguin. "If it isn't Kirby!"

"What do you want Dedede?" asked Tiff angrily.

"I want Kirby!"

The snail pressed a button and a small cannon came out. It fired, separating all of us. Dedede laughed, "Nice shot Escargoon!"

"No problem sire" said Escargoon.

A hand soon reached out and grabbed Kirby. They laughed, but Tiff and Tuff looked mad.

"Leave Kirby alone!" they said.

"Or what!?" they exclaimed.
12422222222222222112222.title: The "King"

124222222222222221122221.content:
I ran forward and jumped onto the hood of the vehicle. They stopped laughing and stared at me.

"Let Kirby go!" I yelled.

"Or what?" asked Escargoon.

"You asked for it."

I jumped down, and readied myself. Please don't make this change anything... I spat out a bomb and hurled it at them. It exploded, and Kirby flew through the air. I caught him, and he looked at me surprised. I placed him down, and just spat out bombs. Dedede and Escargoon drove off. I turned to face the others. Kirby cheered along with the others.

"That was amazing!" said Tiff.

"How'd ya do that?" asked Tuff.

"I guess I have my own powers" I replied.
124222222222222221122221.title: Taking a Risk

1242222222222222211222212.content:
King Dedede and Escargoon barged into the throne room and King Dedede sat down. He pressed a button on his chair, and a screen popped out. Customer Service was on the other end.

"Well if it isn't the..."

"Zip your lip!" shouted Dedede. "You sent me a monster to charge me extra!"

"Whoa now, I don't remember selling you a monster in weeks!"

"Yeah well this one attacked us! It is your fault that he is here in the first place!" shouted Escargoon.

"Well then, what does this creature look like?"

Dedede and Escargoon opened their mouths, but they said nothing. Customer Service smiled, "Unless you have any proof, I can't guarantee anything. Bye!"

He signed off, and Dedede rubbed his head. "How are we supposed to capture a monster?"

"I have a plan your majesty" Escargoon spoke up.
1242222222222222211222212.title: Suspiscion

1343.content:
(I'm not sure,if I'm doing this right...but...I hope I don't get in trouble)
"Ugh...I can't believe I have to wait 10 more days..."I groaned to myself,as I kept walking down the street,towards my home,with my hands in my pockets.They were going to release a movie that I really wanted to see,and I have to wait 10 more days,until it was in theaters,which really stinks.
"Come on,Blaze,you have to get yourself together...and why can't you stop talking to yourself?"I asked.Luckily,at this time of day,no one was awake.
Yes,my name is Blaze.I am a teenager,at only that age of 14.I have pale skin,blue eyes,and gray hair,bowl style.It covered my eyes to people who see my face,but I could still see pretty clearly.I like to wear a black shirt with a flaming skull in the center,and black baggy pants.I like to color black,don't judge me!I have this huge ego on comedy,in fact,one time at school,when somebody started a fight with someone else,I interjected for about a few seconds,then kicked one of them right in between the legs,and ran off.Luckily,I wasn't caught.
"Bored...bored,bored,bo-bored."I sang,taking out a folded boomerang from my left pocket,unfolded it,and threw it.It instantly came back to me,which I did it again.
"Yah!Hough!CHA!"I was mimicking link,from The Legend of Zelda series.I gotta say,for a kid who can't talk,he has a pretty funny voice when he is young.I decided that I should stop before the boomerang flies into a window,so I grabbed it,and I folded it,but that was about it,before I saw this very dark and mysterious man.He was wearing a dark cloak,and he was breathing heavily,so I decided to try to help him.
"Hey,dude,I don't think you've noticed but..."He turned around towards me...and instantly I couldn't believe my eyes.
"Your Darth Vader...so,uh...yeah,wanted to give you the heads up,and--"In a flash,he pulled out a red lightsaber,and it almost touched my face!I could feel it giving off heat waves,which I could see why they could cut through metal...and possibly my skin...and bones.
"Come with me villain...together,we shall rule the world,as ruler and minion."He said,in a dark voice.Okay,that was cheap...MINION!?
"Ugh...that sounds cool,but,I want to give you something special,for our declared,friendship."I lied...just so you guys know about it,and get this...he fell for it.He put the lightsaber away,and I unfolded my boomerang,and handed it too him.He inspected it carefully.
"What is this...this...inferior object?"He angrily said,holding my boomerang,and it looked ready to break at any moment.
"You see that's not the best part."I said,which he looked at me questionably.
"The best part of it it..."
******************Ding*****************
"The villains are coming!The villains are coming!"I screamed,jokingly,like that guy who warned some town about the British,but that wasn't the point...right now,I was running as my life depended on it,even though I left Darth Vader in the dust,from my little trick.Did you guess what I did?Go on,take a guess.
"Oh!A doughnut shop!"I stopped mid tracks,and enjoyed the sight of the doughnuts,especially the glazed.I continued my path towards my home,coursing the street,when all of a sudden,something crashed through,what sounds like glass,right behind me.I slowly turned my head,seeing some kind of pink ball,eating all of the doughnuts.I realized it as Kirby,from the series.
"Hey,hey,hey...hold on,you pink fluff."I said,as I walked over to the shop,grabbing the attention of Kirby.
"Don't eat all the doughnuts by yourself."I yanked a doughnut from his hand,and started eating it.
"Boyal?Kirby said,tilting what seems to be his head.
"What are you doing here?I thought--"Kirby was instantly shot,with some kind of energy,which I quickly turned my head,and dropped my doughnut,from seeing Metanight,up in the sky,with his dark wings.
"Oh...uh...hi there...well,I better get going and uh--"Metaknight flew past me,and into the doughnut shop,which I instantly heard some cutting noises,before he was sent flying hundreds of feet into the air.Kirby jumped out of the shop,with a link hat,and a sword.He turned to me,and waved his stubby hand,before running off.
"Okay,what the heck in going on here!?"I screamed,which something very hot,passed right in front of me.I turned to where it came from,seeing Mario trying to take on Bowser,but Luigi was running my run.
"WWWWHHHAAAAAHAHAHAHHHHH!!"He screamed,like a little girl.I just held out my hand,and instantly I caught onto his suspenders,and was moving at high speeds.
"Here we goooooooo!"I yelled,like Mario would in his games.I just hope Luigi knows something about this...after he stops running in fear...
(Again...I don't know,if I am doing this right...)
1343.title: I was brought into this...

13431.content:
After Luigi had stopped,he explained what was going on.He said,that there was a good side vs. bad said war,and all,I repeat,ALL video game characters are caught in it.
"So,why did Darth Vader try to attack me?"I asked,pointing behind me.
"The villains don't care about people.They are planning to hurt anyone that gets in their way,which means nobody is safe out here,man!"Luigi said,shaking like a child who wet his pants.We both heard some kind of boo like cry,which sounded like it came from behind me.
"Oh good..."I was being sarcastic...which a big flock of boos,following a one big boo.This big boo was wearing a giant crown on the top of his body,which I quickly recognized as King boo!
"Oh good!What the heck is this!?He's not in any video games!"I yelled.
"Uh...did you ever play a game called Luigi's mansion."
"Oh yeah..."As soon as I said that,king boo went transparent...WHAT!?He had my boomerang inside it.
"Hey!Get back here!"I yelled,dashing towards the flock of boos.How did he get my boomerang?I probably dropped it,when I snatched onto Luigi...FUDGE!!It didn't take long,before I caught up to the boos,which I caught onto the tail of one of them.
"Hello...thanks for the lift!"I pulled myself onto of the boo,which he started flapping his arms,while we were both going downwards.
"Get off!Who are you!?"The boo asked...which for some reason...sounded female...
"Oh...since when was a boo a girl?"I asked.
"Since we first appeared!Why do you think there's so many of us?"
"Well,I didn't really mind,I have a big stealer to catch!"I then jumped off the boo,and onto another one,which I continued to do it,until I finally caught up,and onto the tail of King boo.He was completely unaware of my existence.
"Hey,buddy...hello...HEELLLOOOOO!?"I yelled,poking him...which wasn't doing anything.
"HELLO!!"I punched him...which still didn't make him stop,so I decided to climb up to his face...which he soon looked down at me.
"Oh,hey,you don't know me,and I know you...but,you have something very important that is rightfully--"He came to a complete stop,which sent me flying into a wall,with my back,breaking the fall...oh wait...
"You dare touch King boo's face!?"He asked,trying to scare me his with scary face...with his tongue sticking out.
"I touched your face,because you need a breath mint."I said,pulling out an breath mint.Really,his breath does stink.I heard many boos laughing behind him.
"GRAHHHH!!"He pulled out his tongue,which I saw my opportunity...
"Okay,I know that you're mad,but I have something that will calm you down."
"WHAT!?"
**************Smack**********
Ha!Surely fooled him!I pulled out his tongue,and let it go,which made him hit himself in the face with his tongue.The hit was able to knock out my boomerang,but...at a cost for having the whole flock of boos chasing after me.
"Ha-ha-haha-ha!"I mocked,sticking out my tongue,right before I turned a corner,and into an alley,which all the boos flew past the alley,some of them were screaming to get me.
"*Idiots...why do I feel like i'm in a cartoon all of a sudden?*"I thought.I peeked out from the alley,look left and right,then walked out of the alley,with my chest puffed out.
"A sudden tough man,I see..."That sounded like that girl boo from before,and she was right behind me.
"Huh?I thought you were with the boos.You're not gonna call them back,are ya?"I asked.
"No...in fact,I wanna say something."She said,as she floated around in a circle.
"Look,I know that you're just a boy,and that you probably don't know what to say,but...may--"She was interrupted,when a giant tongue shot out and grabbed her around her mouth,and most of her body,which the tongue pulled back...and into the mouth of Belome...that freakish eyed creep from Super Mario Rpg.
"Blah!Too sweat!"He said,as he stuck his tongue out in disgust.I couldn't believe he ate her in one go.
"Hey,four eyes!"I called,which he turned all of his eye into my direction.
"Yeah,you.I suggest that you let go of my friend,before things get real ugly."I cracked my knuckles...but all he did was laugh.
"I mean it!"I added,which he laughed even harder.He was laughing so hard,he actually fell on his back,with a loud thud,and I could practically see tears coming out of eyes.I took the opportunity to jump up onto his stomach,while he was laughing,which he didn't even notice it.
"Hey,boo,can you hear me?"I asked.
"Yes!Just get me out of here!It's really hot in here,it's like i'm inside a factory!"She screamed.Belome was still laughing,which made me worry,if he's that easy to fool.I stood up,and quickly stomped on his stomach,as hard as I can,which he quickly stopped,and I could see one of his eyes drop a tear.
"Ow!That really hurt."He whimpered,which I stomped on his stomach again,which he coughed up the boo girl,right into my arms.
"Ew..."She and I both said,right before I started running with her in my arms.
"I can't believe,you actually came back for me.My name is Boo,by the way."She said.
"Eh...not even a villain should do that do another person."I said,picking up my speed,but then I was stopped mid-way,for the tongue of Belome wrapped around my waist.
"Oh my god!He's gonna eat both of us...uh...um..."
"Blaze."
"Blaze!What are we going to do!?"Boo seemed really jumpy,in my arms...but,for some odd reason,he let go,with his tongue flailing.
"EW-EW-EW-EW-EW!!"Belome screamed,patting down his tongue with his stubby arms.I tasted that bad?
"Uh...okay."
"Blaze,now's our chance.We need to get him."
"But,i'm not good or bad,i'm just a normal boy."
"You are?"
"Hey!That's my meal."Belome stuck out his tongue,which I was certain he was after Boo.
"Chance over...run!"I yelled,which I was running at blazing speeds,with Boo following behind me.

144332222222.content: The first option is a girl called Kora. She is the adopted sister of Xion (oh yeah, I forgot to add Xion in the characters, duh. I'll add her afterwards.) and also her best friend. Kora's other best friends are Axel and Roxas. She is the same age as Roxas and a love blossoms between the two of them later on. What they both don't realise however, is that Kora is really a glitch in the 'nobody' system. When Roxas and Namine were created, this glitch happened, forming Kora (K-airi. S-ora = Kora). She looks almost exactly like a female version of Roxas and instead of wielding a Keyblade like most other characters, she has the power to turn Heartless to her side. There is a limit to this power however. She can only control about 5 Heartless at a time, and it also weakens her for the next few hours. Later on, after the whole 'relationship with Roxas' thing, she turns bad, but I haven't got the plot for what happenbs there yet so bear with me. If you like the character Kora, I have a Twitter account for her, @KandyHeartKora. Please stick with the storyline and don't do anything stupid. I'll start her story off and then it's up to you. Please enjoy reading and writing Kora's story and I hope you have fun!

But anyway, I'm gonna start this after Kora has met Roxas, Xion, and Axel and they've all become friends. This part of the story will be on a hot summer's day when Roxas has been spending the past two weeks at Castle Oblivion on a secret mission from Organisation XIII, seeing Kora only once or twice in that time. But today, he has completed the secret mission and he's ready to surprise Kora in Twilight Town, where she is sat, drawing...
1443322222221.title: Start Kora's Story

14433222222211.content:
{Roxas' POV}

I had a huge surprise for Kora. I hadn't seen her in ages and I felt I owed it to her to give her something for the trouble. I looked down in my hand at the handmade ice-cream charm for her beloved charm bracelet. I hoped she'd like it. I stopped in my tracks and scanned round for Kora. She was usually in this area, but today I couldn't see her. Where was she? I carried on walking round, feeling thoroughly confused. There must be something important on for her to not be in her usual spot in Twilight Town. Maybe she was a t home. But why? I spotted Hayner and Olette across the square. I walked over to them, feeling thoroughly depressed.
'Hey, has any of you guys seen Kora?'
Olette shook her head slowly, but Hayner seemed to be doing some thinking.
'You know, I think I saw her earlier. She looked like she was busy though, so she took off pretty quick.'
My heart leapt, 'Do you know where she went?'
'Uh...' Hayner looked around, 'Somewhere that way I think,' he said, pointing in the direction of the ice-cream van.
'Thanks.'
'No problem. Hey Roxas, I have to ask you-'
But I had already shot off in the direction of where he had pointed. Sure enough, Kora was sat precariously on a ledge, drawing something. I had planned to sneak up on her, but it seemed that my mere presence had somehow alerted her. She looked up before I had even taken two steps towards her. A huge grin had spread out on her face. She seemed positively glowing. She dropped the sketch pad she was holding and skipped over to me, her hands behind her back.
'Roxy!' she said childishly, hugging me. I hugged back gratefully.
'Kora! I've missed you!'
'I missed you too! Life has been dead without you. What was it that you were doing at C.O anyway?'
I tapped my nose playfully. She sighed and shook her head, but she was still smiling.
'Anyway, I have something for you!' she said, digging in her black satchel.
I raised my eyebrows, 'You do?'
'Yep!' she brought her hand back out of the bag and opened her palm, revealing a red, white and black frienddship bracelet. I looked closely at it, shockingly, I realised the black and white pieces of thread had the miniscule initials 'K + R' printed into them, in the opposite colours. I looked at it in awe.
'Kora. H- how did you know what my favourite colours are?'
Her face seemed puzzled for a split second, but the confusion cleared as soon as it appeared, 'Intuition. And... they're my favourite colours too,' she said, blushing slightly.
'Awww. It's beautiful.'
She looked at me worryingly, 'Do you want it?'
I was stunned, 'Of course I do!'
She smiled and wrapped it round my wrist, before tying it delicately. She looked pleased with herself.
'Oh hey, I have something for you too!'
She looked at me shyly, 'Aw, Roxas. You didn't have to.'
I opened my palm again to reveal the little charm. Kora's face was full of delight.
'Oh Roxas! Did you make that yourself!?'
I just smiled as I handed it to her. She took it carefully, and attatched it to... a friendship bracelet exactly the same as mine. I looked at her, stunned. She blushed.
'I- I just wanted our friendship to be special is all...' she trailed off, blushing furiously. I was blushing too. She seemd to be looking for something else to say.
'So... ice-cream?'
I grinned widely, 'Now how can I refuse that?'
She giggled cutely and linked arms with me as we headed towards the ice-cream van. I saw Hayner and Olette again and waved, but they didn't wave back. In fact, they looked quite worried. I probably should have been worried too, but I wasn't, as at the ice-cream van, were Axel and Xion. I smiled as I realised Kora had planned all this. I smiled as I realised how lucky I was to have friends like them. Unfortunately, I didn't listen to the little, niggling worry at the back of my mind. If only I had...
14433222222211.title: Okay. Now start Kora's story...

144332222222111.content:
(I forgot to say, Kora's 15. I don't know how old Roxas was supposed to be so I'm just presuming they're both 15. Anyway...)

{Kora's POV}

I giggled at the look on Roxas' face when he saw Axel and Xion. I was so glad it made him happy. I'd been planning this for days after all. Xion was the first to run up to Roxas. She leapt into his arms and he twirled her round. They were both laughing. I hid my jealousy. I knew Roxas couldn't feel love, but still...
After the giggles had subsided, Roxas let go of Xion and walked up to Axel. They gave each-other a brotherly hug. They pulled away and Roxas looked at me. He seemed completely content until he suddenly looked at me curiously.
'Kora? What were you drawing earlier?'
Oh no! The sketch pad!
I cursed loudly and quickly ran to get it. Luckily it seemed no-one had tampered with it. If anybody saw what was in there... I began to flick back to the picture I had been doing but Roxas came round the corner.
'Kora!?'
'Sorry. It's just important this doesn't go missing.'
His face spread into a mischeivous grin. He put his hands behind his back and sidled up to me.
'Whyever not?'
I blushed, 'It's private.'
'Lemme see!' he said, trying to snatch it playfully.
'Nooooo,' I laughed. 'Roxas don't!'
He laughed with me, 'Aww. You're blushing! You look cute when you blush.'
If possible, I blushed even more. He laughed.
'Okay then. Let's go.' He linked his arm in mine again and led me back. I realised Hayner and Olette for the first time that morning. They were looking at me suspiciously.
'Roxas? What's with Hayner and Ol-'
'Kora!? Where did you go!?' Xion ran up to me and tackle-hugged me. I nearly fell over with the impact.
'Woah! Calm down Xi! I was jsut getting my sketchpad.'
'I wanna see!'
Roxas grabbed her outstretched hand, laughing, 'That's a no-go zone Xion. She won't even let me see it.'
'Oh.' Xion looked downcast. I giggled and looked at Axel.
'You've been pretty quiet lately. You okay?'
He looked at me, 'What? Oh, um. Yeah. Fine. Why do you ask?'
I shruged, 'I dunno. You just seem away with the fairies.'
He laughed, 'I always loved that saying.'
I put my weight on one leg, 'Yeah... but you love everything about me anyway. No, wait. Eveyone loves everything about me.'
It took Axel a moment to realise I was joking. He laughed and ruffled my hair.
'Hey!' I said, pouting and pushing his hand away. 'You know I don't like it when you do that!'
'I know. I just wanted to annoy you,' he said, laughing again. Roxas cleared his throat.
'Kora? Where's my ice-cream?' he said, pouting.
'Aww. Does ickle Roxy want his sugar rush?'
He nodded, 'Yeah.'
I laughed and dug in my pocket for my munny. I ordered 4 ice-creams and paid the woman at the ice-cream van before handing them out. It was then I realised something wierd. Roxas looked at me.
'Kora? What is it?'
'I may be wrong. But I could've sworn I just saw a blue person go down that alleyway...'
Roxas laughed nervously, 'I think you need to lie down.'
'No seriously. I just saw this blue dude go round that corner. I swear.'
Roxas sighed, 'Well, if you're so sure. I guess we can go check it out.'
That was all I needed I ran down towards the alleyway and... nothing.
Roxas came up behind me, 'Told ya.'
'But...'
He put his arm round my shoulder, 'Come on Kora. Let's get you home...'

As Roxas led Kora away followed by Axel and Xion. A naked blue man peered round from behind a trashcan.
'That was close... Now. Where is Ansem? If I hope to catch Sierra, then this is my closest hope...'
144332222222111.title: Next chapter

1443322222222.content:
Okay. This next character comes in after Kora's story ends. I haven't really explored her charactyer very much as I've just invented her. But I'll update you when I can.

As you may have guessed, her name is Bailey. She's a very girly and outgoing girl who loves to giggle. She's 15 and has bright orange hair and blue eyes. She sorta had a thing going on with Lexaeus but it's nothing serious. Yeah, I forgot to say, she used to know Organisation XIII way before Kora came along so that's how she knows them. She will be the one to uncover the secret of the nobodies and she will also uncover some mysterious force that I am not elaborating on cause it's too good to spill.

Recently, (because Lexaeus died. Sob.) she's been torn between Vanitas and Ventus, but she doesn't want to get too attatched. Again, I'll elaborate when I can...
1443322222222.title: Other

14433222222221.content:
"Wait for me. If I return..."

Those were the last words he had said to her. As Bailey sat cross-legged on the floor of Lexaeus' old room, she tried to remember everything that had ever happened between them. Yet all she could remember, were those last, ironic words he had spoken to her.

Riku had killed him. That much was certain. She had heard the news from Xion a few nights ago. Xion usually came to check on Bailey. As Bailey wasn't allowed in Castle Oblivion, it was now Xion's job to make sure Xemnas didn't find out. It had been two nights since she's heard from her though. She probably figured since Bailey was upset, she didn't want to disturb her. Bailey stood up slowly and made her way over to the window. She used to come up to his room this way. He'd always be waiting for her. But not any more.

Bailey placed her hands on the cold windowsill. The chill made her hands numb, but she didn't care. As far as she was concerned, nothing mattered any more. She stared out at the night sky, and a tear rolled down her cheek. She missed him. As she closed her eyes slowly, a new mwmory flashed across her mind.

"If I had a heart, it would belong to you..."

That had happened five days ago. When neither of them had any idea of what was to come. At the time, Bailey had imagined herself staying with Lexaeus forever. Even if they did argue. Sure, Lexaeus wasn't perfect. But who was? Truth was, Bailey loved him. Even though she promised herself not to.

This was their fault.

Bailey sighed, her breath misting up the window. She turned round and walked over to Lexaeeus' bed. Bailey stared at it for a while. Remembering every memory they had ever had. And then. She cried. Really cried. Bailey fell to her knees and sobbed uncontrollably, her fists clutching the sheets, trying to bring back everything she had lost. After her tears had subsided slightly, she slowly climbed into the bed and cried quietly. As Bailey's tears slowly began to lull her to sleep, she made herself a promise.

'I will never love another person again.'
14433222222221.title: Start Bailey's Story

144332222222211.content:
Bailey's eyes opened slowly. She felt numb. She sat up slowly and put her head in her hands, missing Lexaeus more than ever. It got worse every day. As a shaky sigh escaped her lips, Bailey her a soft knock at the door. Xion.

Without waiting for an answer, the door was opened. But Xion wasn't the only person there. Roxas and Axel stood behind her, looking sheepish. Axel was the first to speak up.

'You okay?'

Xion turned to him, a hopeless expression on her face.

'No Axel. She's just lost the most important person in her life, and she feels fantastic. What do you think?'

Axel shrugged,' Well sor-ry for trying to be helpful.'

Xion sighed and turned back to Bailey.

'Xemnas knows. But he's okay with it. Shockingly. He says it's understandable seeing as Lex is...' Xion's eyes scanned the room, trying to avoid saying it. 'But uh, he says you can't stay any longer than a week...'

Bailey shrugged, unable to speak. She looked down at the sheets. Not feeling anything, except emptiness. Xion sighed and walked over to her.

'Look, it's gonna be okay. You'll get over him in time...'

Bailey looked up at her, frustrated. No-one understood.

'How do you know!? You don't have a heart! How can you possibly hope to understand what I'm going through!?'

Xion looked taken aback. She backed off, looking sad. Roxas finally made a move and walked up to her. He sat on the edge of the bed and put his arm round her.

'Look, Bailey. You're right, we don't understand. But we're trying the best we can. I know you're hurting right now but will you please stop pushing us away? It doesn't help.'

He stood up slowly and walked back towards the door, followed by Axel and Xion. Before Xion went to close the door she turned to Bailey.

'Remember, we're here. If you need us...'

And with that, she closed the door behind her. Leaving Bailey, once more, alone.

That was Bailey's first mistake.
144332222222211.title: Continue Bailey's Story...

1443322222222111.content:
A few hours later, Bailey decided that she was probably stable enough to confront Namine. Lexaeus' other love interest. She opened her door slowly before remembering that Xemnas already knew of her prescence in the castle. A thought then crossed her mind: How did he find out? Bailey made her way, barefoot, down to Namine's room. Anger rippling through her. Namine was the main reason her and Lexaeus argued. He wasn't happy with one girl. She wasn't happy with two girls. Bailey and Lexaeus had split up various times because of Namine's jealousy. Bailey finally made her way to the door. A million speeches crossed her mind. But she didn't choose any of them. She flung open the door to reveal Namine sat in a corner, drawing as usual. She looked up slowly, and she couldn't hide the slight worry on her face. She knew what was coming. Bailey strode across the room and grabbed Namine by the hair.

'What did you do!?'

Namine whimpered, 'I- I...'

Bailey dragged her across the room, towards the window. The view went out to the area where Lexaeus had died. Bailey pulled Namine up and made her look at it.

'Look Namine! Are you happy!? Are you happy that he was put through so much stress, that he got angry and fought Riku!? This is your fault Namine!'

Bailey dropped Namine, fuming. Namine sat in a heap on the floor, looking scared. But Bailey wasn't finished.

'You don't even have a heart! You never even loved him! I hate you!'

To any other person, this scene would have seemed deadly ironic. There wwas the girl with the blonde hair and white dress, cowering on the floor. While the orange haired girl clad in black skintight jeans and matching strappy top stood over her, fists clenched. While the real situation was, Bailey was the victim...

choices: Meetra attempts to hear through the Force
145121.content:
"Meetra, you should sleep," Atton sighed, having watched the Jedi exile for some time now. "I have no idea what you and that old hag did back on Malachor V, but I know that just sitting there isn't going to help," he explained, flicking autopilot on.
         She didn't reply to him, only shaking her head. I wish I could tell him it had nothing to do with Kreia... she thought sadly to herself.
"Listen, I'm not taking no for an answer. It's not going to do you any good. Everyone else is already asleep..." he urged, walking over and offering his help to get her up.
"What's left of them, anyways..." Meetra murmured, clenching her fists in an attempt to keep from crying.
         Her old team had nearly completely disbanded. Mandalore had returned to Dxun, training his new Mandalorian recruits. Brianna and Mical had both moved on to Dantooine, gathering information to fill the Jedi archives and help rebuild the Jedi Enclave. After having done all she could for the Republic, G0-T0 had bid Meetra's group farewell as well, and made his way back to the smuggler's moon, Nar Shaddaa. Bao-Dur had returned to the Republic, taking T3-M4 with him to assist in the restoration project of Telos and other planets that had fallen in the Mandalorian Wars and the Jedi Civil War. Those who remained were Visas, Mira, Atton, and HK-47.
"I don't know why I even bother with you," Atton grumbled, giving up as he placed his hand's in his pockets. "Go to bed whenever.," he sighed with a yawn, making his way through the Ebon Hawk to one of the dormitories.
145121.title: Meetra Surik

choices: She decides to join Visas in meditation
1451212.content:
Unwilling to submit herself to sleep, Meetra merely sat in the Communications Room, closing her eyes as she began to relax and open her mind to the Force. She could hear the hum of the ship, but she soon stripped away its fixtures, finding her companions thoughts within the spectrum. As always, she could see their bonds to her, but oddly, Atton's seemed thinner than usual. She focused upon him, intent on finding the source of this. As expected, he had his barriers up, not keen on letting her into his thoughts.
Please, Atton... I need to know... Meetra huffed lightly, trying to find a weak point in his barricaded mind. There seemed to be nothing but anger and worry present. There was no where she would be able to access entry to his thoughts, so she sadly decided to move along.
         She went along to the one whom she had the strongest bond with; Visas.
         Visas was not asleep, but meditating. It had not been long since they had been aboard the Ravager and defeated Darth Nihilus, and Meetra was glad to view that Visas was at peace with what they had done. Her bond with Meetra was one of respect and loyalty, and left the Jedi with a sense of happiness.
How she continues to push forward is a mystery to me erupted from Visas' thoughts. I can tell she is hiding something from us.
         Meetra furrowed her brows, slightly bitter that Visas was catching onto her. She decided to move on to Mira.
         Mira was asleep, her thoughts and dreams floating on through the air. It had been some time since Meetra had seen anything containing a thought of Hanharr, which brought her sheer delight, though, along with Visas, Mira had doubts for her.
She's bound to break at some point. The stress is literally pouring from her body. leaked a strand of thoughts from Mira.
         Meetra opened her eyes, staring at the metal floor before noticing tears falling. It was true. She had been dealing with a ton of stress. She had destroyed 2 planets, Peragus II and Malachor V, and killed her mentor, who had literally and admitted to have been using her. Not only that, but having visited Malachor V brought her unwanted memories and nightmares. It seemed that what G0-T0 had said was true; everywhere she went, she brought catastrophe with her.
1451212.title: Meetra attempts to hear through the Force

14512122.content:
There were foot steps. It was easy to tell who's foot steps they were.
"What do you want, HK-47?" Meetra asked, glaring intensely at the assassination droid.
"Explanation: Oh, Master, it is not my wish to disturb you at this hour, but I believe there is something amiss outside the ship. Clarification: Why, it seems to resemble a wormhole of some sort, and is pulling it straight towards it. Suggestion: I would imply we do something to avoid it, for I believe in entering the wormhole, our lives shall be put into jeopardy, and it would be a real shame for a droid of my standards to be put into that position," HK-47 chimed in with his usual bastardizing tone.
"A wormhole?" Meetra exclaimed, jumping up quickly. "HK-47, go get Atton, now!" she shouted, hurrying into the Cockpit of the ship, hoping to get them steered away.
         It didn't take long for the droid to return with a very shaken up Atton, held at rifle point.
"Statement: Here is the meatbag you called for, Master. Do hurry," HK-47 called, walking back to the Garage.
"Atton, we're headed right for a wormhole, any idea how to avoid it?" Meetra huffed, flicking switches and pushing buttons.
"A wormhole?" Atton exclaimed in alarm, jumping into the pilot's seat. "Hang on, this could get bumpy," he gibbered out, tugging at the wheel.
"Atton..!" Meetra shouted, clinging to her seat as the Ebon Hawk began to shake rapidly. "We're not going to clear it!"
"Hang on..!" he yelled, abandoning the wheel as he grabbed Meetra, tossing her onto the ground before covering his body with his own.
         Lights began to flicker, and shouts of panic could be heard throughout the vessel. Alarms blared as shrapnel from the freighter was torn apart from its frame. Meetra clung to her hope that they would not all perish as they were thrust along, the light around her dimming into pitch black as she passed out.

It all started like a normal day for Tails. He had been working on his latest invention for quite some time and it making Tails exhausted. Luckily for him, he was almost finished and unlike all the other inventions that he had created so far, the one he was working on could help change the world for the better. That's what Tails thought anyways. He had managed to create a metal cube with a shiny red button on one of the sides of the cube. It also had a contrapment which allowed to put a small object inside the cube. The only thing that was missing however was that rare starman material that was rumoured to be in other universes.

"Hey Tails, whatya doing?" Sonic asked as he entered the workshop.

"Just creating as usual." Tails replied, "Need anything?"

"Yeah... I found this weird purple diamond on the ground and... uh... I'm wondering if you know anything about it." Sonic handed the object to Tails.

Tails examined the diamond carefully but he couldn't find anything. Curious, he tried putting the diamond inside his metal box and before he thought about it, he pressed the red button. Suddenly, the room started spinning and within a few seconds, the both of them passed out.

He couldn't work out yet why he was in Mario's world now. The Olympics didn't start that early.

"You also look a bit bruised. Let's get you inside my castle and We can sort things out."

"...okay..." Tails weakly replied before going back into unconsciousness.

As soon as he was unconscious, Luigi and Peach picked up both ends of Tails body and carried him over inside one of the guest rooms that Peach has inside her castle. She wondered why Tails would appear just like that. Something just had to be going on.

14533221211.content:
Night had long fallen on Sequin Land, painting the vibrant, tropical landscape in a calming aura. Apart from bats, spider girls and anyone having the occasional late night ice cream snack, it was uncommon for anyone to be out at this time. However, if one were to take a right at Scuttle town and take hours of hiking through sense jungle, one would find a being more then just up.

Risky smirked as she slashed away at the underbrush, her arms not even tired. Her pirate hat was safely stowed in her scam to keep from damage, leaving her purple hair and red bandana out in the open. "Just a little farther." She thought to herself. "Those falls have to be around here somewhere." Normally, Risky tried to keep personal action to a minimum but tonight was a special night indeed. Tonight was the culmination of months of planning and years of story interpretation. Well...that and most of her Tinkerbats were too imcompitent for the task at hand. "That half-genie brat might have ruined my last few plans, but when I'm done...ohh she will be at my knees." Pulling a map from her sack, Risky turned right at a crooked tree and heard the sound of rushing water. Upon this, she picked up her pace with an evil grin on her face. Exiting the brush, Risky found herself at the foot of a large waterfall coming from a cliff low enough to have been unseeable from above. "Ammo Baron really came through on this bet, not only was he dumb enough to have never found this, but that fool gave me this treasure trove for a few cannonball. I'll have to thank that idiotic moron when I rule the world." Somewhere in this landscape was a way to gain power unlike anything this realm had ever known, and boy was Risky curious over what it was. Examining the base, Risky saw several slots of orbs cut into the rock. Whipping out her pistol, she shot into each hole, the bullets filling nicely. The wall pulled back revealing what appeared to be.
